GK16andhvy_u:5: kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti budhair yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvas tasyābhāvaṃ jagadur apare bhāktam āhus tam anye /
GK16andhvy_u:6: kecid vācām sthitam aviṣaye tattvam ūcus tadīyaṃ tena brūmaḥ sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpam // DhvK_1.1 //
GK16andhvy_u:7: budhaiḥ kāvya-tattva-vidbhiḥ kāvyasyātmā dhvanir iti saṃjñitaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:8: paramparayā yaḥ samāmnāta-pūrvaḥ samyak āsamantāt mnātaḥ prakaṭitaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:12: tatra ca śabda-gatāś cārutva-hetavo 'nuprāsādayaḥ prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvy_u:14: varṇa-saṅghaṭanādharmāś ca ye mādhuryādayas te 'pi pratīyante /
GK16andhvy_u:15: tad-anatirikta-vṛttayo vṛttayo 'pi yāḥ kaiścid upanāgarikādyāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:20: prasiddha-prasthāna-vyatirekiṇaḥ kāvya-prakārasya kāvyatva-hāneḥ sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlādi-śabdārtha-mayatvam eva kāvya-lakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvy_u:22: na ca tat-samatāntaḥ-pātinaḥ sahṛdayān kāṃścit parikalpya tat-prasiddhyā dhvanau kāvya-vyapadeśaḥ pravartito 'pi sakala-vidvan-mano-grāhitām avalambate /
GK16andhvy_u:23: punar apare tasyābhāvam anyathā kathayeyuḥ-na sambhavaty eva dhvanir nāmāpūrvaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvy_u:24: kāmanīyakam anati-vartamānasya tasyokteṣv eva cārutva-hetuṣv antar-bhāvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:25: teṣām anyatamasyaiva vā apūrva-samākhyā-mātra-karaṇe yat kiṃcana kathanaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:26: kiṃ ca vāg-vikalpānām ānantyāt sambhavaty api vā kasmiṃścit kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyibhiḥ
GK16andhvy_u:27: prasiddhair apradarśite prakāra-leśe dhvanir dhvanir iti yad etad alīka-sahṛdayatva-bhāvanā-mukulita-locanair nṛtyate,
GK16andhvy_u:29: sahasraśo hi mahātmabhir anyair alaṅkāra-prakārāḥ prakāśitāḥ prakāśyante ca /
GK16andhvy_u:30: na ca teṣām eṣā daśā śrūyate /
GK16andhvy_u:32: na tv asya kṣoda-kṣamam tattvam kiṃcid api prakāśayituṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvy_u:34: yasminn asti na vastu kiṃcana manaḥ-prahlādi sālaṃkṛti
GK16andhvy_u:35: vyutpannai racitaṃ ca naiva vacanair vakrokti-śūnyaṃ ca yat /
GK16andhvy_u:36: kāvyaṃ tad-dhvaninā samanvitam iti prītyā praśaṃsañ jaḍo
GK16andhvy_u:37: no vidmo 'bhidadhāti kiṃ sumatinā pṛṣṭaḥ svarūpaṃ dhvaneḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:39: anye taṃ dhvani-saṃjñitam kāvyātmānaṃ guṇa-vṛttir ity āhuḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:40: yady api ca dhvani-śabda-saṃkīrtanena kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyibhir guṇa-vṛttir anyo vā na kaścit prakāraḥ prakāśitaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:41: tathāpi amukhya-vṛttyā kāvyeṣu vyavahāraṃ darśayatā dhvani-mārgo manāk spṛṣṭo 'pi na lakṣita iti parikalpyaivam uktam-“bhāktam āhus tam anye” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:42: kecit punar lakṣaṇa-karaṇa-śālīna-buddhayo dhvanes tattvaṃ girām agocaram sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam eva samākhyātavantaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:43: tenaivaṃ-vidhāsu vimatiṣu sthitāsu sahṛdaya-manaḥ-prītaye tat-svarūpaṃ brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:44: tasya hi dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ sakala-sat-kavi-kāvyopaniṣad-bhūtam atiramaṇīyam aṇīyasībhir api cirantana-kāvya-lakṣaṇa-vidhāyināṃ buddhibhir anunmīlita-pūrvam,
GK16andhvy_u:45: atha ca rāmāyaṇa-mahābhārata-prabhṛtini lakṣye sarvatra prasiddha-vyavahāraṃ lakṣayatāṃ sahṛdayānām ānando manasi labhatāṃ pratiṣṭhām iti prakāśyate
GK16andhvy_u:46: tatra dhvaner eva lakṣayitum ārabdhasya bhūmikāṃ racayitum idam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:48: vācya-pratīyamānākhyau tasya bhedāv ubhau smṛtau // DhvK_1.2 //
GK16andhvy_u:49: kāvyasya hi lalitocita-sanniveśa-cāruṇaḥ śarīrasyevātmā sāra-rūpatayā sthitaḥ sahṛdaya-ślāghyo yo 'rthas tasya vācyaḥ pratīyamānaś ceti dvau bhedau /
GK16andhvy_u:50: tatra vācyaḥ prasiddho yaḥ prakārair upamādibhiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:52: tato neha pratanyate kevalam anūdyate punar yathopayogam iti // DhvA_1.3 //
GK16andhvy_u:53: pratīyamānaṃ punar anyad eva vastv asti vāṇīṣu mahā-kavīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:54: yat tat prasiddhāvayavātiriktaṃ vibhāti lāvaṇyam ivāṅganāsu // DhvK_1.4 //
GK16andhvy_u:55: pratīyamānaṃ punar anyad eva vācyād vastv asti vāṇīṣu mahā-kavīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:56: yat tat sahṛdaya-suprasiddhaṃ prasiddhebhyo 'laṅkṛtebhyaḥ pratītebhyo vāvayavebhyo vyatiriktatvena prakāśate lāvaṇyam ivāṅganāsu /
GK16andhvy_u:57: yathā hy aṅganāsu lāvaṇyaṃ pṛthaṅ-nirvarṇyamānaṃ nikhilāvayava-vyatireki kim apy anyad eva sahṛdaya-locanāmṛtaṃ tattvāntaraṃ tadvad eva so 'rthaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:58: sa hy artho vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptam vastu-mātram alaṅkāra-rasādayaś cety aneka prabheda-prabhinnau darśayiṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:59: sarveṣu ca teṣu prakāreṣu tasya vācyād anyatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:60: tathā hy ādyas tāvat prabhedo vācyād dūram vibhedavān /
GK16andhvy_u:61: sa hi kadācid vācye vidhi-rūpe pratiṣedha-rūpaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:62: bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mārio deṇa /
GK16andhvy_u:65: [bhrama dhārmika visrabdhaḥ sa śunako 'dya māritas tena /
GK16andhvy_u:68: attā ettha ṇimajjai ettha ahaṃ diasaaṃ paloehi /
GK16andhvy_u:69: mā pahia rattiandhia sejjāe maha ṇimajjahisi //[*4]
GK16andhvy_u:74: mā pathika rātryandha śayyāyāṃ mama nimaṅkṣyasi //)
GK16andhvy_u:76: vacca maha bbia ekkei hontu ṇīsāsaroiabbāiṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:77: mā tujja bi tīa biṇā dakkhiṇa-haassa jāantu //[*5]
GK16andhvy_u:80: mā tavāpi tayā vinā dākṣiṇya-hatasya janiṣata //]
GK16andhvy_u:83: ahisāriāṇaṃ vigghaṃ karosi aṇṇāṇaṃ bi haāse //[*6]
GK16andhvy_u:86: abhisārikāṇāṃ vighnaṃ karoṣy anyāsām api hatāśe //]
GK16andhvy_u:88: kassa ba ṇa hoi roso daṭṭhūṇa piyāe sa-bbaṇaṃ aharaṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:91: [kasya vā na bhavati roṣo dṛṣṭvā priyāyāḥ sa-vraṇam adharam /
GK16andhvy_u:93: anye caivaṃ-prakārā vācyād vibhedinaḥ pratīyamāna-bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti /
GK16andhvy_u:95: dvitīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyād vibhinnaḥ sa-prapañcam agre darśayiṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:96: tṛtīyas tu rasādi-lakṣaṇaḥ prabhedo vācya-sāmarthyākṣiptaḥ prakāśate,
GK16andhvy_u:97: na tu sākṣāc-chabda-vyāpāra-viṣaya iti vācyād vibhinna eva /
GK16andhvy_u:98: tathā hi vācyatvaṃ tasya sva-śabda-niveditatvena vā syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:105: na tu tatkṛtā viṣayāntare tathā tasyā adarśanāt /
GK16andhvy_u:106: na hi kevala-śṛṅgārādi-śabda-mātra-bhāji vibhāvādi-pratipādana-rahite kāvye manāg api rasavattva-pratītir asti /
GK16andhvy_u:107: yataś ca svābhidhānam antareṇa kevalebhyo 'pi vibhāvādibhyo viśiśṭebhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:111: iti tṛtīyo 'pi prabhedo vācyād vibhinna eveti sthitam /
GK16andhvy_u:112: vācyena tv asya saheva pratītir ity agre darśayiṣyate // DhvA_1.4 //
GK16andhvy_u:113: kāvyasyātmā sa evārthas tathā cādikaveḥ purā /
GK16andhvy_u:116: cādikaver vālmīkeḥ nihata-sahacarī-viraha-kātara-krauñcākranda-janitaḥ śoka eva ślokatayā pariṇataḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:119: sarasvatī svādu tad-artha-vastu niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:121: tat vastu-tattvaṃ niḥṣyandamānā mahatāṃ kavīnāṃ bhāratī aloka-sāmānyaṃ pratibhā-viśeṣaṃ parisphurantam abhivyanakti /
GK16andhvy_u:122: yenāsminn ativicitra-kavi-paramparā-vāhini saṃsāre kālidāsa-prabhṛtayo dvitrāḥ pañcaṣā vā mahā-kavaya iti gaṇyante // DhvA_1.6 //
GK16andhvy_u:125: vedyate sa tu kāvyārtha-tattvajñair eva kevalam // DhvK_1.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:126: so 'rtho yasmāt kevalaṃ kāvyārtha-tattva-jñair eva jñāyate /
GK16andhvy_u:127: yadi ca vācya-rūpa evāsāv arthaḥ syāt tad-vācya-vācaka-rūpa-parijñānād eva tat-pratītiḥ syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:129: svara-śruty-ādi-lakṣaṇam ivāpragītānāṃ gāndharva-lakṣaṇa-vidām agocara evāsāv arthaḥ // DhvA_1.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:130: evaṃ vācya-vyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasya sad-bhāvaṃ pratipādya prādhānyaṃ tasyaiveti darśayati-
GK16andhvy_u:132: yatnataḥ pratyabhijñeyau tau śabdārthau mahākaveḥ // DhvK_1.8 //
GK16andhvy_u:138: idānīṃ vyaṅgya-vyañjakayoḥ prādhānye 'pi yad-vācya-vācakāv eva prathamam upādadate kavayas tad api yuktam evetyāha-
GK16andhvy_u:140: tad-upāyatayā tadvad arthe vācye tad-ādṛtaḥ // DhvK_1.9 //
GK16andhvy_u:141: yathā hy ālokārthī sann api dīpa-śikhāyāṃ yatnavāñ jano bhavati tad-upāyatayā /
GK16andhvy_u:143: tad vyaṅgyam arthaṃ pratyādṛto jano vācye 'rthe yatnavān bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:144: anena pratipādakasya kaver vyaṅgyam arthaṃ prati vyāpāro darśitaḥ // DhvA_1.9 //
GK16andhvy_u:148: yathā hi padārtha-dvāreṇa vākyārthāvagamas tathā vācyārtha-pratīti-pūrvikā vyaṅgyasyārthasya pratipattiḥ // DhvA_1.10 //
GK16andhvy_u:149: idānīṃ vācyārtha-pratīti-pūrvakatve 'pi tat-pratīter vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānyaṃ yathā na vyālupyate tathā darśayati-
GK16andhvy_u:151: yathā vyāpāra-niṣpattau padārtho na vibhāvyate // DhvK_1.11 //
GK16andhvy_u:152: yathā sva-sāmarthya-vaśenaiva vākyārthaṃ prakāśayann api padārtho vyāpāra-niṣpattau na bhāvyate vibhaktatayā // DhvA_1.11 //
GK16andhvy_u:155: evaṃ vācya-vyatirekiṇo vyaṅgyasyārthasya sad-bhāvaṃ pratipādya prakṛta upayojayann āha-
GK16andhvy_u:156: yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā tam artham upasarjanīkṛta-svārthau /
GK16andhvy_u:157: vyaṅktaḥ kāvya-viśeṣaḥ sa dhvanir iti sūribhiḥ kathitaḥ // DhvK_1.13 //
GK16andhvy_u:158: yatrārtho vācya-viśeṣaḥ vācaka-viśeṣaḥ śabdo vā tam arthaṃ vyaṅktaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:160: anena vācya-vācaka-cārutva-hetubhya upamādibhyo 'nuprāsādibhyaś ca vibhakta eva dhvaner viṣaya iti darśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:161: yad apy uktam-“prasiddha-prasthānātikramiṇo mārgasya kāvya-hāner dhvanir nāsti” iti,
GK16andhvy_u:163: yato lakṣaṇa-kṛtām eva sa kevalaṃ na prasiddhaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:164: lakṣye tu parīkṣyamāṇe sa eva sahṛdaya-hṛdayāhlāda-kāri kāvya-tattvam /
GK16andhvy_u:166: yad apy uktam-“kāmanīyakam anativartamānasya tasyoktālaṅkārādi-prakāreṣv antar-bhāvaḥ” iti,
GK16andhvy_u:168: vācya-vācaka-mātrāśrayiṇi prasthāne vyaṅgya-vyañjaka-samāśrayeṇa vyavasthitasya dhvaneḥ katham antar-bhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:174: nanu yatra pratīyamānasyārthasya vaiśadyenāpratītiḥ sa nāma mā bhūd dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:177: tatra dhvaner antar-bhāvo bhaviṣyatīty ādi nirākartum abhihitam-“upasarjanī-kṛta-svārthau” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:179: guṇīkṛtābhidheyaḥ śabdo vā yatrārthāntaram abhivyanakti sa dhvanir iti /
GK16andhvy_u:188: ity ādau vyaṅgyenānugataṃ vācyam eva prādhānyena pratīyate samāropita-nāyikā-nāyaka-vyavahārayor niśā-śaśinor eva vākyārthatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:189: ākṣepe 'pi vyaṅgya-viśeṣākṣepiṇo 'pi vācyasyaiva cārutvaṃ prādhānyena vākyārtha ākṣepokti-sāmarthyād eva jñāyate /
GK16andhvy_u:190: tathā hi-tatra śabdopārūḍho viśeṣābhidhānecchayā pratiṣedha-rūpo ya ākṣepaḥ sa eva vyaṅgya-viśeṣam ākṣipan mukhyaṃ kāvya-śarīram /
GK16andhvy_u:193: aho daiva-gatiḥ kīdṛk tathāpi na samāgamaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:194: atra satyām api vyaṅgya-pratītau vācyasyaiva cārutvam utkarṣavad iti tasyaiva prādhānya-vivakṣā /
GK16andhvy_u:195: yathā ca dīpakāpahnuty-ādau vyaṅgyatvenopamāyāḥ pratītāv api prādhānyenāvivakṣitatvān na tayā vyapadeśas tadvad atrāpi draṣṭavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:197: āhūto 'pi sahāyair om ity uktvā vimukta-nidro 'pi /
GK16andhvy_u:198: gantu-manā api pathikaḥ saṅkocaṃ naiva śithilayati //
GK16andhvy_u:199: ity ādau vyaṅgyasya prakaraṇa-sāmarthyāt pratīti-mātraṃ na tu tat-pratīti-nimittā kācic cārutva-niṣpattir iti na prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:200: paryāyokte 'pi yadi prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvaṃ tad bhavatu nāma tasya dhvanāv antar-bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:203: na punaḥ paryāyo bhāmahodāhṛta-sadṛśe vyaṅgyasyaiva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:205: apahnuti-dīpakayoḥ punar-vācyasya prādhānyaṃ vyaṅgyasya cānuyāyitvaṃ prasiddham eva /
GK16andhvy_u:209: atha vācyopasarjanī-bhāvena vyaṅgyasya tatrāvasthānaṃ tadā so 'pi dhvani-viṣayo 'stu,
GK16andhvy_u:210: na tu sa eva dhvanir iti vaktuṃ śakyam /
GK16andhvy_u:212: api ca saṅkarālaṅkāre 'pi ca kvacit saṅkaroktir eva dhvani-sambhāvanāṃ nirākaroti /
GK16andhvy_u:213: aprastuta-praśaṃsāyām api yadā sāmānya-viśeṣa-bhāvān nimitta-nimitti-bhāvād vā abhidhīyamānasyāprastutasya
GK16andhvy_u:214: pratīyamānena prastutenābhisambandhas tadābhidhīyamāna-pratīyamānayoḥ samam eva prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:215: yadā tāvat sāmānyasyāprastutasyābhidhīyamānasya prākaraṇikena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānena
GK16andhvy_u:216: sambandhas tadā viśeṣa-pratītau satyām api prādhānyena tat-sāmānyenāvinābhāvāt sāmānyasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:217: yadāpi viśeṣasya sāmānya-niṣṭhatvaṃ tadāpi sāmānyasya prādhānye sāmānye sarva-viśeṣāṇām antar-bhāvād viśeṣasyāpi prādhānyam /
GK16andhvy_u:219: yadā tu sārūpya-mātra-vaśenāprastuta-praśaṃsāyām aprakṛta-prakṛtayoḥ sambandhas tadāpy aprastutasya sarūpasyābhidhīyamānasya prādhānyenāvivakṣāyāṃ dhvanāv evāntaḥ-pātaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:225: na dhvanir yatra vā tasya prādhānyaṃ na pratīyate //
GK16andhvy_u:226: tat-parāv eva śabdārthau yatra vyaṅgyaṃ prati sthitau /
GK16andhvy_u:227: dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayo mantavyaḥ saṅkarojjhitaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:231: tasya punar aṅgāni-alaṅkārā guṇā vṛttayaś ceti pratipādayiṣyante /
GK16andhvy_u:235: yatrāpi vā tattvaṃ tatrāpi dhvaner mahā-viṣayatvān na tan-niṣṭhatvam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:240: te ca śrūyamāṇeṣu varṇeṣu dhvanir iti vyavaharanti /
GK16andhvy_u:241: tathaivānyais tan-matānusāribhiḥ sūribhiḥ kāvya-tattvārtha-darśibhir vācya-vācaka-sammiśraḥ śabdātmā kāvyam iti vyapadeśyo vyañjakatva-sāmyād dhvanir ity uktaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:245: na ca teṣu kathañcid īrṣyayā kaluṣita-śemuṣī-katvam āviṣkaraṇīyam /
GK16andhvy_u:246: tad evaṃ dhvanes tāvad abhāva-vādinaḥ pratyuktāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:248: sa cāsāv avivakṣita-vācyo vivakṣitāny apara-vācyaś ceti dvividhaḥ sāmānyena /
GK16andhvy_u:251: śūraś ca kṛta-vidyaś ca yaś ca jānāti sevitum //
GK16andhvy_u:253: śikhariṇi kva nu nāma kiyac ciraṃ
GK16andhvy_u:257: yad apy uktaṃ bhaktir dhvanir iti,
GK16andhvy_u:259: bhaktyā bibharti naikatvam rūpa-bhedād ayaṃ dhvaniḥ // DhvK_1.14a //
GK16andhvy_u:260: ayam ukta-prakāro dhvanir bhaktyā naikatvaṃ bibharti bhinna-rūpatvāt /
GK16andhvy_u:261: vācya-vyatiriktasyārthasya vācya-vācakābhyāṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśanaṃ yatra vyaṅgya-prādhānye sa dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:263: mā caitat syād bhaktir lakṣaṇaṃ dhvaner ity āha-
GK16andhvy_u:264: ativyāpter athāvyāpter na cāsau lakṣyate tayā // DhvK_1.14b //
GK16andhvy_u:268: yatra hi, vyaṅgya-kṛtaṃ mahat-sauṣṭhavaṃ nāsti tatrāpy upacarita-śabda-vṛttyā prasiddhy-anurodha-pravartita-vyavahārāḥ kavayo dṛśyante /
GK16andhvy_u:277: ramia puṇo bi ramijja{i} pie jaṇe ṇatthi puṇaruttaṃ //
GK16andhvy_u:279: viramya punā ramyate priyo jano nāsti punaruktam //]
GK16andhvy_u:282: jaha gahiā taha hiaaṃ haranti ucchinta-mahilāo //
GK16andhvy_u:284: yathā gṛhītās tathā hṛdayaṃ haranti svairiṇyo mahilāḥ //]
GK16andhvy_u:286: ajjāe pahāro ṇavala-dāe diṇṇo pieṇa thaṇa-baṭṭe /
GK16andhvy_u:287: mi{u}o bi dūsaho bbia jāo hiae savattīṇaṃ //
GK16andhvy_u:289: mṛduko 'pi duḥsaha iva jāto hṛdaye sapatnīnām //]
GK16andhvy_u:291: parārthe yaḥ pīḍām anubhavati bhaṅge 'pi madhuro
GK16andhvy_u:292: yadīyaḥ sarveṣām iha khalu vikāro 'py abhimataḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:293: na samprāpto vṛddhiṃ yadi sa bhṛśam akṣetra-patitaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:294: kim ikṣor doṣo 'sau na punar aguṇāyā maru-bhuvaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:296: na caivaṃ-vidhaḥ kadācid api dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yataḥ-
GK16andhvy_u:298: śabdo vyañjakatāṃ bibhrad dhvany-ukter viṣayībhavet // DhvK_1.15 //
GK16andhvy_u:301: rūḍhā ye viṣaye 'nyatra śabdāḥ sva-viṣayād api /
GK16andhvy_u:302: lāvaṇyādyāḥ prayuktās te na bhavanti padaṃ dhvaneḥ // DhvK_1.16 //
GK16andhvy_u:304: tathā-vidhe ca viṣaye kvacit sambhavann api dhvani-vyavahāraḥ prakārāntareṇa pravartate /
GK16andhvy_u:308: yad uddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhalad-gatiḥ // DhvK_1.17 //
GK16andhvy_u:309: tatra hi cārutvātiśaya-viśiṣṭārtha-prakāśana-lakṣaṇe prayojane kartavye yadi śabdasyāmukhyatā tadā tasya prayoge duṣṭataiva syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:312: vyañjakatvaika-mūlasya dhvaneḥ syāl lakṣaṇaṃ katham // DhvK_1.18 //
GK16andhvy_u:313: tasmād anyo dhvanir anyā ca guṇa-vṛttiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:316: anye ca bahavaḥ prakārā bhaktyā vyāpyantaḥ ;
GK16andhvy_u:318: kasyacid dhvani-bhedasya sā tu syād upalakṣaṇam /
GK16andhvy_u:319: sā punar bhaktir vakṣyamāṇa-prabheda-madhyād anyatamasya bhedasya yadi nāmopalakṣaṇatayā sambhāvyeta ;
GK16andhvy_u:320: yadi ca guṇa-vṛttyaiva dhvanir lakṣyata ity ucyate tad-abhidhā-vyāpāreṇa tad-itaro
GK16andhvy_u:321: 'laṅkāra-vargaḥ samagra eva lakṣyata iti pratyekam alaṅkārāṇāṃ lakṣaṇa-karaṇa-vaiyarthya-prasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:323: lakṣaṇe 'nyaiḥ kṛte cāsya pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ // DhvK_1.19a //
GK16andhvy_u:324: kṛte 'pi vā pūrvam evānyair dhvani-lakṣaṇe pakṣa-saṃsiddhir eva naḥ ;
GK16andhvy_u:326: sa ca prāg eva saṃsiddha ity ayatna-sampanna-samīhitārthāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ smaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:327: ye 'pi sahṛdaya-hṛdaya-saṃvedyam anākhyeyam eva dhvaner ātmānam āmnāsiṣus te 'pi na parīkṣya vādinaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:328: yata uktayā nītyā vakṣyamāṇayā ca dhvaneḥ sāmānya-viśeṣa-lakṣaṇe pratipādite 'pi yady anākhyeyatvaṃ tat sarveṣām eva vastūnāṃ tat-prasaktam
GK16andhvy_u:329: yadi punar dhvaner atiśayoktyānayā kāvyāntarātiśāyi taiḥ svarūpam ākhyāyate tat te 'pi yuktābhidhāyina eva //
GK16andhvy_u:335: avivakṣita-vācyasya dhvaner vācyaṃ dvidhā matam // DhvK_2.1 //
GK16andhvy_u:340: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhora-hṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe
GK16andhvy_u:341: vaidehī tu katham bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava //[*9]
GK16andhvy_u:347: tālā jāanti guṇā jālā de sahiaehiṃ gheppanti /
GK16andhvy_u:349: [tadā jāyante guṇā yadā te sahṛdayair gṛhyante /
GK16andhvy_u:356: gaanaṃ ca matta-mehaṃ dhārāluli-ajjunāiṃ a baṇāiṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:362: vivakṣitābhidheyasya dhvaner ātmā dvidhā mataḥ // DhvK_2.2 //
GK16andhvy_u:364: sa ca vācyārthāpekṣayā kaścid alakṣya-kramatayā prakāśate,
GK16andhvy_u:371: idānīṃ rasavad-alaṅkārād alakṣya-krama-dyotanātmano dhvaner vibhakto viṣaya iti pradarśyate-
GK16andhvy_u:373: rasādi-paratā yatra sa dhvaner viṣayo mataḥ // DhvK_2.4 //
GK16andhvy_u:375: guṇāś ca parasparaṃ dhvany-apekṣayā vibhinna-rūpā vyavasthitās tatra kāvye dhvanir
GK16andhvy_u:378: kāvye tasminn alaṅkāro rasādir iti me matiḥ // DhvK_2.5 //
GK16andhvy_u:379: yady api rasavad-alaṅkārasyānyair darśito viṣayas tathāpi yasmin kāvye pradhānatayānyo
GK16andhvy_u:380: 'rtho vākyārthī-bhūtas tasya cāṅga-bhūtā ye rasādayas te rasāder alaṅkārasya viṣayā
GK16andhvy_u:382: tad yathā cāṭuṣu preyo 'laṅkārasya vākyārthatve 'pi rasādayo 'ṅgabhūtā dṛśyante /
GK16andhvy_u:383: sa ca rasādir alaṅkāraḥ śuddhaḥ saṅkīrṇo vā /
GK16andhvy_u:385: kiṃ hāsyena na me prayāsyasi punaḥ prāptaś cirād darśanaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:389: ity atra karuṇa-rasasya śuddhasyāṅga-bhāvāt spaṣṭam eva rasavad-alaṅkāratvam /
GK16andhvy_u:390: evam evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye rasāntarāṇāṃ spaṣṭa evāṅgabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:393: gṛhṇan keśeṣv apāstaś caraṇa-nipatito nekṣitaḥ sambhrameṇa /
GK16andhvy_u:395: kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:396: ity atra tripura-ripu-prabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatve īrṣyā-vipralambhasya śleṣa-sahitasyāṅga-bhāva iti,
GK16andhvy_u:398: ata eva cerṣyā-vipralambha-karuṇayor aṅgatvena vyavasthānāt samāveśo na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:399: yatra hi rasasya vākyārthī-bhāvas tatra katham alaṅkāratvam ?
GK16andhvy_u:405: tasmād yatra rasādayo vākyārthī-bhūtāḥ sa sarvo na rasāder alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ ;
GK16andhvy_u:408: yatra tu prādhānyenārthāntarasya vākyārthī-bhāve rasādibhiś cārutva-niṣpattiḥ kriyate,
GK16andhvy_u:410: evaṃ dhvaner upamādīnāṃ rasavad-alaṅkārasya ca vibhakta-viṣayatā bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:411: yadi tu cetanānāṃ vākyārthī-bhāvo rasādy-alaṅkārasya viṣaya ity ucyate tarhy upamādīnāṃ pravirala-viṣayatā nirviṣayatā vābhihitā syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:412: yasmād acetana-vastu-vṛtte vākyārthī-bhūte punaś cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanayā yathā-kathañcid bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:413: atha satyām api tasyāṃ yatrācetanānāṃ vākyārthī-bhāvo nāsau rasavad-alaṅkārasya viṣaya ity ucyate /
GK16andhvy_u:414: tan mahataḥ kāvya-prabandhasya rasanidhānabhūtasya nīrasatvamabhihitaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:423: cintā maunam ivāśritā madhu-kṛtāṃ śabdair vinā lakṣyate
GK16andhvy_u:424: caṇḍī mām avadhūya pāda-patitaṃ jātānutāpeva sā //
GK16andhvy_u:429: te jāne jaraṭhī-bhavanti vigalan nīla-tviṣaḥ pallavāḥ //[*10]
GK16andhvy_u:431: ity evam ādau viṣaye 'cetanānāṃ vākyārthī-bhāve 'pi cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanāsty eva /
GK16andhvy_u:432: atha yatra cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanāsti tatra rasādir alaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:433: tad evaṃ saty upamādayo nirviṣayāḥ pravirala-viṣayā vā syuḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:434: yasmān nāsty evāsāv acetana-vastu-vṛttānto yatra cetana-vastu-vṛttānta-yojanā nāsty antato vibhāvatvena /
GK16andhvy_u:436: yaḥ punar aṅgī raso bhāvo vā sarvākāram alaṅkāryaḥ sa dhvaner ātmeti // DhvA_2.5 //
GK16andhvy_u:438: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:439: aṅgāśritās tv alaṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvK_2.6 //
GK16andhvy_u:440: ye tam arthaṃ rasādi-lakṣaṇam aṅginaṃ santam avalambate te guṇāḥ śauryādivat /
GK16andhvy_u:441: vācya-vācaka-lakṣaṇāny aṅgāni ye punas tad-āśritās te 'laṅkārā mantavyāḥ kaṭakādivat // DhvA_2.6 //
GK16andhvy_u:443: śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ paraḥ prahlādano rasaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:444: tan-mayaṃ kāvyam āśritya mādhuryaṃ pratitiṣṭhati // DhvK_2.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:447: śravyatvaṃ punar ojaso 'pi sādhāraṇam iti // DhvA_2.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:449: mādhuryam ārdratāṃ yāti yatas tatrādhikaṃ manaḥ // DhvK_2.8 //
GK16andhvy_u:454: raudrādayo hi rasāḥ parāṃ dīptim ujjvalatāṃ janayantīti lakṣaṇayā ta eva dīptir ity ucyate /
GK16andhvy_u:461: yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti sva-bhuja-guru-madaḥ pāṇḍavīnāṃ camūnāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:462: yo yaḥ pāñcāla-gotre śiśur adhika-vayā garbha-śayyāṃ gato vā /
GK16andhvy_u:463: yo yas tat-karma-sākṣī carati mayi raṇe yaś ca yaś ca pratīpaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:464: krodhāndhas tasya tasya svayam api jagatām antakasyāntako 'ham //(veṇi 3.32)
GK16andhvy_u:466: samarpakatvaṃ kāvyasya yat tu sarva-rasān prati /
GK16andhvy_u:467: sa prasādo guṇo jñeyaḥ sarva-sādhāraṇa-kriyaḥ // DhvK_2.10 //
GK16andhvy_u:469: sa ca sarva-rasa-sādhāraṇo guṇaḥ sarva-racanā-sādhāraṇaś ca vyaṅgyārthāpekṣayaiva mukhyatayā vyavasthito mantavyaḥ // DhvA_2.10 //
GK16andhvy_u:470: śruti-duṣṭādayo doṣā anityā ye ca darśitāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:471: dhvany-ātmany eva śṛṅgāre te heyā ity udāhṛtāḥ // DhvK_2.11 //
GK16andhvy_u:472: anityā doṣāś ca ye śruti-duṣṭādayaḥ sūcitās te 'pi na vācye artha-mātre,
GK16andhvy_u:473: na ca vyaṅgye śṛṅgāre vā dhvaner anātma-bhūte /
GK16andhvy_u:474: kiṃ tarhi ? dhvanyātmany eva śṛṅgāre 'ṅgitayā vyaṅgye te heyā ity udāhṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:475: anyathā hi teṣām anitya-doṣataiva na syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:476: evam ayam asaṃlakṣya-krama-dyoto dhvaner ātmā pradarśitaḥ sāmānyena // DhvA_2.11 //
GK16andhvy_u:477: tasyāṅgānāṃ prabhedā ye prabhedāḥ svagatāś ca ye /
GK16andhvy_u:479: aṅgitayā vyaṅgyo rasādir vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasya dhvaner eka ātmā ya uktas tasyāṅgānāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:480: vācya vācakānupātinām alaṅkārāṇāṃ ye prabhedā niravadhayo ye ca svagatās tasyāṅgino
GK16andhvy_u:482: anantāḥ svāśrayāpekṣayā niḥsīmāno viśeṣās teṣām anyonya-sambandha-parikalpane kriyamāṇe
GK16andhvy_u:483: kasyacid anyatamasyāpi rasasya prakārāḥ parisaṅkhyātuṃ na śakyante kim uta sarveṣām /
GK16andhvy_u:484: tathā hi śṛṅgārasyāṅginas tāvad ādyau dvau bhedau-sambhogo vipralambhaś ca /
GK16andhvy_u:488: teṣāṃ ca deśa-kālādy-āśrayāvasthā-bheda iti svagata-bhedāpekṣayaikasya tasyāparimeyatvaṃ,
GK16andhvy_u:490: te hy aṅga-prabhedāḥ pratyekam aṅgi-prabheda-sambandha-parikalpane kriyamāṇe satyānantyam evopayānti // DhvA_2.12 //
GK16andhvy_u:493: diṅ-mātra-kathanena hi vyutpannānāṃ sahṛdayānām ekatrāpi rasa-bhede sahālaṅkārair aṅgāṅgi-bhāva-parijñānād āsāditālokā buddhiḥ sarvatraiva bhaviṣyati
GK16andhvy_u:496: sarveṣv eva prabhedeṣu nānuprāsaḥ prakāśakaḥ // DhvK_2.14 //
GK16andhvy_u:497: aṅgino hi śṛṅgārasya ye uktāḥ prabhedās teṣu sarveṣv eka-prakārānubandhitayā prabandhena pravṛtto 'nuprāso na vyañjakaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:500: śaktāv api pramāditvaṃ vipralambhe viśeṣataḥ // DhvK_2.15 //
GK16andhvy_u:501: dhvaner ātma-bhūtaḥ śṛṅgāras tātparyeṇa vācya-vācakābhyāṃ prakāśyamānas tasmin yamakādīnāṃ yamaka-prakārāṇāṃ nibandhanaṃ duṣkara-śabda-bhaṅga-śleṣādīnāṃ śaktāv api pramāditvaṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:502: “pramāditvam” ity anenaitad darśyate-kāka-tālīyena kadācit kasyacid ekasya yamakāder niṣpattāv api bhūmnālaṅkārāntaravad rasāṅgatvena nibandho na kartavya iti /
GK16andhvy_u:503: “vipralambhe viśeṣata” ity anena vipralambhe saukumāryātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
GK16andhvy_u:504: tasmin dyotye yamakāder aṅgasya nibandho niyamān na kartavya iti // DhvA_2.15 //
GK16andhvy_u:508: niṣpattāv āścarya-bhūto 'pi yasyālaṅkārasya rasākṣiptatayaiva bandhaḥ śakya-kriyo bhavet so 'sminn alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgye dhvanāv alaṅkāro mataḥ
GK16andhvy_u:509: tasyaiva rasāṅgatvaṃ mukhyam ity arthaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:513: priyo manyur jātas tava niranurodhe na tu vayam //[*11]
GK16andhvy_u:515: rasāṅgatve ca tasya lakṣaṇam apṛthag-yatna-nirvartyatvam iti yo rasaṃ bandhu-madhya-vasitasya
GK16andhvy_u:516: kaver alaṅkāras tāṃ vāsanām atyūhya yatnāntaram āsthitasya niṣpadyate sa na rasāṅgam iti /
GK16andhvy_u:517: yamake ca prabandhena buddhi-pūrvakaṃ kriyamāṇe niyamenaiva yatnāntara-parigraha āpatati śabda-viśeṣānveṣaṇa-rūpaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:519: alaṅkārāntarāṇi hi nirūpyamāṇa-durghaṭanāny api rasa-samāhita-cetasaḥ pratibhānavataḥ kaver aham-pūrvikayā parāpatanti /
GK16andhvy_u:521: yathā ca māyā-rāma-śiro-darśanena vihvalāyāṃ sīta-devyāṃ setau /
GK16andhvy_u:528: śaktasyāpi rase 'ṅgatvaṃ tasmād eṣāṃ na vidyate //
GK16andhvy_u:530: dhvany-ātma-bhūte śṛṅgāre tv aṅgatā nopapadyate // DhvA_2.16 //
GK16andhvy_u:535: vācyālaṅkāravargaś ca rūpakādiryāvānukto vakṣyate ca kaiścit,
GK16andhvy_u:537: sa sarvo 'pi yadi samīkṣya viniveśyate tada-lakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dhvaner aṅginaḥ sarvasyaiva cārutvaheturniṣpadyate // DhvA_2.17 //
GK16andhvy_u:543: rasa-bandheṣv atyādṛta-manāḥ kavir yam alaṅkāraṃ tad aṅgatayā vivakṣati / yathā [śaku. 1.20]-
GK16andhvy_u:547: vayaṃ tattvānveṣān madhukara hatās tvaṃ khalu kṛtī //[*12]
GK16andhvy_u:551: kadācid rasādi-tātparyeṇa vivakṣito 'pi hy alaṅkāraḥ kaścid aṅgitvena vivakṣito dṛśyate / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:554: atra hi paryāyoktasyāṅgitvena vivakṣā rasādi-tātparye saty apīti /
GK16andhvy_u:555: aṅgatvena vivakṣitam api yam avasare gṛhṇāti nānavasare /
GK16andhvy_u:558: uddāmotkalikāṃ vipāṇḍura-rucaṃ prārabdha-jṛmbhāṃ kṣaṇād āyāsaṃ śvasanodgamair aviratair ātanvatīm ātmanaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:559: adyodyānalatām imāṃ samadanāṃ nārīm ivānyāṃ dhruvaṃ paśyan kopa-vipāṭala-dyuti mukhaṃ devyāḥ kariṣyāmy aham //[*13]
GK16andhvy_u:562: gṛhītam api ca yam avasare tyajati tad-rasānuguṇa-tayālaṅkārāntarāpekṣayā / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:563: raktas tvaṃ nava-pallavair aham api ślāghyaiḥ priyāyā guṇais
GK16andhvy_u:564: tvām āyānti śilīmukhāḥ smara-dhanur-muktās tathā mām api /
GK16andhvy_u:565: kāntāpāda-talāhatis tava mude tadvan mamāpy āvayoḥ
GK16andhvy_u:566: sarvaṃ tulyam aśoka kevalam ahaṃ dhātrā sa-śokaḥ kṛtaḥ //[*14]
GK16andhvy_u:568: atra hi prabandha-pravṛtto 'pi śleṣo vyatireka-vivakṣayā tyajyamāno rasa-viśeṣam puṣṇāti /
GK16andhvy_u:570: alaṅkārāntaram eva śleṣa-vyatireka-lakṣaṇaṃ narasiṃhavad iti cet-na,
GK16andhvy_u:572: yatra hi śleṣa-viṣaya eva śabde prakārāntareṇa vyatireka-pratītir jāyate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:573: yathā-“sa harir nāmnā devaḥ sa-harir vara-turaga-nivahena” ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:574: atra hy anya eva śabdaḥ śleṣasya viṣayo 'nyaś ca vyatirekasya /
GK16andhvy_u:575: yadi caivaṃ-vidhe viṣaye 'laṅkārāntaratva-kalpanā kriyate tat-saṃsṛṣṭer viṣayāpahāra eva syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:576: śleṣa-mukhenaivātra vyatirekasyātma-lābha iti nāyaṃ saṃsṛṣṭer viṣaya iti cet-na ;
GK16andhvy_u:579: gāḍhodgīrṇojjvala-śrīr ahani na rahitā no tamaḥ-kajjalena /
GK16andhvy_u:580: prāptotpattiḥ pataṅgān na punar upagatā moṣa-muṣṇa-tviṣo vo
GK16andhvy_u:582: atra hi sāmya-prapañca-pratipādanaṃ vinaiva vyatireko darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:583: nātra śleṣa-mātrāc cārutva-pratītir astīti śleṣasya vyatirekāṅgatvenaiva vivakṣitatvāt na svato 'laṅkāratety api na vācyam /
GK16andhvy_u:584: yata evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye sāmya-mātrād api supratipāditāc cārutvaṃ dṛśyata eva / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:587: antar me dayitā-mukhaṃ tava śaśī vṛttiḥ samaivāvayos
GK16andhvy_u:588: tat kiṃ mām aniśaṃ sakhe jala-dhara tvaṃ dagdhum evodyataḥ //[*15] ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:590: rasa-nirvahaṇaika-tāna-hṛdayo yaṃ ca nātyantaṃ nirvoḍhum icchati / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:592: nītvā vāsa-niketanaṃ dayitayā sāyaṃ sakhīnāṃ puraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:593: bhūyo naivam iti skhalat-kala-girā saṃsūcya duśceṣṭitaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:594: dhanyo hanyata eva nihnuti-paraḥ preyān rudatyā hasan //
GK16andhvy_u:595: atra hi rūpakam ākṣiptam anirvyūḍhaṃ ca paraṃ rasa-puṣṭaye /
GK16andhvy_u:596: nirvoḍhum iṣṭam api yaṃ yatnād aṅgatvena pratyavekṣate yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:600: hantaika-sthaṃ kvacid api na te bhīru sādṛśyam asti //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:601: sa evam upanibadhyamāno 'laṅkāro rasābhivyakti-hetuḥ kaver bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:603: lakṣyaṃ ca tathāvidhaṃ mahā-kavi-prabandheṣv api dṛśyate bahuśaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:604: tat tu sūkti-sahasra-dyotitātmanāṃ mahātmanāṃ doṣodghoṣaṇam ātmana eva dūṣaṇaṃ bhavatīti na vibhajya darśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:605: kiṃ tu rūpakāder alaṅkāra-vargasya yeyaṃ vyañjakatve rasādi-viṣaye lakṣaṇa-dig-darśitā
GK16andhvy_u:606: tām anusaran svayaṃ cānyal lakṣaṇam utprekṣamāṇo yady alakṣya-krama-pratibham anantaroktam
GK16andhvy_u:607: enaṃ dhvaner ātmānam upanibadhnāti sukaviḥ samāhita-cetās tadā tasyātma-lābho bhavati
GK16andhvy_u:611: asya vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasya dhvaneḥ saṃlakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyatvād anuraṇana-prakhyo ya ātmā so 'pi śabda-śakti-mūlo 'rtha-śakti-mūlaś ceti dvi-prakāraḥ // DhvA_2.20 //
GK16andhvy_u:612: nanu śabda-śaktyā yatrārthāntaraṃ prakāśate sa yadi dhvaneḥ prakāra ucyate tad idānīṃ śleṣasya viṣaya evāpahṛtaḥ syāt,
GK16andhvy_u:615: yasminn anuktaḥ śabdena śabda-śakty-udbhavo hi saḥ // DhvK_2.21 //
GK16andhvy_u:616: yasmād alaṅkāro na vastu-mātraṃ yasmin kāvye śabda-śaktyā prakāśate sa śabda-śakty-udbhavo dhvanir ity asmākaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvy_u:617: vastu-dvaye ca śabda-śaktyā prakāśamāne śleṣaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:620: yasyāhuḥ śaśimac chiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ
GK16andhvy_u:621: pāyāt sa svayam andhaka-kṣaya-karas tvāṃ sarvado mādhavaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:622: nanv alaṅkārāntara-pratibhāyām api śleṣa-vyapadeśo bhavatīti darśitaṃ bhaṭṭodbhaṭena,
GK16andhvy_u:623: tat punar api śabda-śakti-mūlo dhvanir niravakāśa ity āśaṅkyedam uktam “ākṣipta” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:624: tad ayam arthaḥ-yatra śabda-śaktyā sākṣād alaṅkārāntaraṃ vācyaṃ sat pratibhāsate sa sarvaḥ śleṣa-viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:625: yatra tu śabda-śaktyā sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ vācya-vyatiriktaṃ vyaṅgyam evālaṅkārāntaraṃ prakāśate sa dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:627: tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargād eva hāriṇau /
GK16andhvy_u:629: atra śṛṅgāra-vyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣād-virodhālaṅkāraś ca pratibhāsata iti virodha-cchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:631: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya tu dhvaner vācyena śleṣeṇa virodher na vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
GK16andhvy_u:632: tasyā vināpi hāreṇa nisargād eva hāriṇau /
GK16andhvy_u:634: atra śṛṅgāra-vyabhicārī vismayākhyo bhāvaḥ sākṣād-virodhālaṅkāraś ca pratibhāsata iti virodha-cchāyānugrāhiṇaḥ śleṣasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:636: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya tu dhvaner vācyena śleṣeṇa virodher na vā vyañjitasya viṣaya eva /
GK16andhvy_u:641: sthāne yāṃ svatanor apaśyad adhikāṃ sā rukmiṇī vo 'vatāt //
GK16andhvy_u:642: atra vācyatayaiva vyatireka-cchāyānugrāhī śleṣaḥ pratīyate / yathā ca-
GK16andhvy_u:653: sa cākṣipto 'laṅkāro yatra punaḥ śabdāntareṇābhihita-svarūpas tatra na śabda-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-vyavahāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:655: dṛṣṭyā keśava gopa-rāga-hṛtayā kiṃcin na dṛṣṭaṃ mayā
GK16andhvy_u:656: tenaiva skhalitāsmi nātha patitāṃ kiṃ nāma nālambase /
GK16andhvy_u:657: ekas tvaṃ viṣameṣu khinna-manasāṃ sarvābalānāṃ gatir
GK16andhvy_u:658: gopyaivaṃ gaditaḥ sa-leśam avatād goṣṭhe harir vaś ciram //
GK16andhvy_u:659: evaṃ-jātīyakaḥ sarva eva bhavatu kāmaṃ vācya-śleṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:660: yatra tu sāmarthyākṣiptaṃ sad-alaṅkārāntaraṃ śabda-śaktyā prakāśate sa sarva eva dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:661: yathā-“atrāntare kusuma-samaya-yugam upasaṃharann ajṛmbhata grīṣmābhidhānaḥ phulla-mallikā-dhavalāṭṭa-hāso mahā-kālaḥ” /
GK16andhvy_u:667: pūrvāhṇe viprakīrṇā diśi diśi viramaty ahni saṃhāra-bhājaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:669: gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ parama-parimitāṃ prītim utpādayantu //
GK16andhvy_u:671: mā prasāṅkṣīd ity aprākaraṇika-prākaraṇikārthayor upamānopameya-bhāvaḥ kalpayitavyaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:672: sāmarthyād ity arthākṣipto 'yaṃ śleṣo na śabdopārūḍha iti vibhinna eva śleṣād anusvānopama-vyaṅgyasya dhvaner viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:673: anye 'pi cālaṅkārāḥ śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgye dhvanau sambhavanty eva /
GK16andhvy_u:676: yatra ca mātaṅga-gāminyaḥ śīlavatyaś ca gauryo vibhava-ratāś ca śyāmāḥ padma-rāgiṇyaś ca dhavala-dvija-śuci-vadanā madirāmodiśvasanāś ca pramadāḥ
GK16andhvy_u:677: atra hi vācyo virodhas tac-chāyānugrāhī vā śleṣo 'yam iti na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GK16andhvy_u:679: yatra hi sākṣāc-chabdāvedito virodhālaṅkāras tatra hi śliṣṭoktau vācyālaṅkārasya virodhasya śleṣasya vā viṣayatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:684: sarvaika-śaraṇam akṣayam adhīśam īśaṃ dhiyāṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇam /
GK16andhvy_u:686: atra hi śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpo virodhaḥ sphuṭam eva pratīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:689: khaṃ ye 'tyujjvalayanti lūna-tamaso ye vā nakhodbhāsino
GK16andhvy_u:690: ye puṣṇanti saroruha-śriyam api kṣiptābja-bhāsaś ca ye /
GK16andhvy_u:691: ye mūrdhasv avabhāsinaḥ kṣiti-bhṛtāṃ ye cāmarāṇāṃ śirāṃ-
GK16andhvy_u:692: syākrāmanty ubhaye 'pi te dina-pateḥ pādāḥ śriye santu vaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:693: evam anye 'pi śabda-śakti-mūlānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvani-prakārāḥ santi te sahṛdayaiḥ svayam anusartavyāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:694: iha tu grantha-vistara-bhayān na tat-prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:695: artha-śakty-udbhavas tv anyo yatrārthaḥ sa prakāśate /
GK16andhvy_u:696: yas tātparyeṇa vastv anyad vyanakty uktiṃ vinā svataḥ // DhvK_2.22 //
GK16andhvy_u:697: yatrārthaḥ sva-sāmarthyād arthāntaram abhivyanakti śabda-vyāpāraṃ vinaiva so 'rtha-śakty-udbhavo nāmānusvānopama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:699: evaṃ vādini devarṣau pārśve pitur adhomukhī /
GK16andhvy_u:701: atra hi līlā-kamala-patra-gaṇanam upasarjanīkṛta-svarūpaṃ śabda-vyāpāraṃ vinaivārthāntaraṃ vyabhicāri-bhāva-lakṣaṇaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:703: yato yatra sākṣac-chabda-niveditebhyo vibhāvānubhāva-vyabhicāribhyo rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:705: yathā kumāra-sambhave madhu-prasaṅge vasanta-puṣpābharaṇaṃ vahantyā devyā āgamanādi-varṇanaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:709: yatra ca śabda-vyāpāra-sahāyo 'rtho 'rthāntarasya vyañjakatvenopādīyate sa nāsya dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:712: atra līlā-kamala-nimīlanasya vyañjakatvam uktyaiva niveditam // DhvA_2.22 //
GK16andhvy_u:716: śabda-śaktyārtha-śaktyā śabdārtha-śaktyā vākṣipto 'pi vyaṅgyo 'rthaḥ kavinā punaryatra svoktyā prakāśī-kriyate so 'smād anusvānopama-vyaṅgyād dhvaner anya evālaṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:717: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyasya vā dhvaneḥ sati sambhave sa tādṛg anyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:719: vatse mā gā viṣādaṃ śvasanam urujavaṃ santyajordhva-pravṛttaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:720: kampaḥ ko vā gurus te bhavatu balabhidā jṛmbhitenātra yāhi /
GK16andhvy_u:722: yasmai lakṣmī-madād vaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ mantha-mūḍhāṃ payodhiḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:724: ambā śete 'tra vṛddhā pariṇata-vayasām agraṇīr atra tāto
GK16andhvy_u:731: artho 'pi dvividho jñeyo vastuno 'nyasya dīpakaḥ // DhvK_2.24 //
GK16andhvy_u:732: artha-śakty-udbhavānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgye dhvanau yo vyañjako 'rtha uktas tasyāpi dvau prakārau-kaveḥ kavi-nibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ prauḍhokti-mātra-niṣpanna-śarīra
GK16andhvy_u:743: kavi-nibaddha-vaktṛ-prauḍhokti-mātra-niṣpanna-śarīro yathodāhṛtam eva-“śikhariṇi” ity ādi / yathā vā-
GK16andhvy_u:745: abhyutthānam iva manmathasya dattaṃ tava stanābhyām //
GK16andhvy_u:746: svataḥ sambhavī ya aucityena bahir api sambhāvyamāna-sad-bhāvo na kevalaṃ bhaṇiti-vaśenaivābhiniṣpanna-śarīraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:752: vācyālaṅkāra-vyatirikto yatrānyo 'laṅkāro 'rtha-sāmarthyāt pratīyamāno 'vabhāsate so 'rtha-śakty-udbhavo nāmānusvāna-rūpa-vyaṅgyo 'nyo dhvaniḥ
GK16andhvy_u:755: sa sarvo gamyamānatvaṃ bibhrad bhūmnā pradarśitaḥ // DhvK_2.26 //
GK16andhvy_u:756: anyatra vācyatvena prasiddho yo rūpakādir alaṅkāraḥ so 'nyatra pratīyamānatayā bāhulyena pradarśitas tatrabhavadbhir bhaṭṭodbhaṭādibhiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:757: tathā ca sa-sandehādiṣūpamā-rūpakātiśayoktīnāṃ prakāśamānatvaṃ pradarśitam ity alaṅkārāntarasyālaṅkārāntare vyaṅgyatvaṃ na yatna-pratipādyam
GK16andhvy_u:760: tat-paratvaṃ na vācyasya nāsau mārgo dhvaner mataḥ // DhvK_2.27 //
GK16andhvy_u:761: alaṅkārāntareṣu tv anuraṇana-rūpālaṅkāra-pratītau satyām api yatra vācyasya vyaṅgya-pratipādanaunmukhyena cārutvaṃ na prakāśate nāsau dhvaner mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:762: tathā ca dīpakādāv alaṅkāre upamāyā gamyamānatve 'pi tatparatvena cārutvasyāvyavasthānān na dhvani-vyapadeśaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:763: canda-maūehiṃ ṇimā ṇalinī kamalehiṃ kusuma-gucchehiṃ laā /
GK16andhvy_u:764: haṃsehiṃ saraa-sohā kavva-kahā sajjanehiṃ kara{i} garuī //
GK16andhvy_u:766: haṃsaiḥ śārada-śobhā kāvya-kathā sajjanaiḥ kriyate gurvī //]
GK16andhvy_u:767: ity ādiṣūpamā-garbhatve 'pi sati vācyālaṅkāra-mukhenaiva cārutvaṃ vyavatiṣṭhate na vyaṅgyālaṅkāra-tātparyeṇa /
GK16andhvy_u:769: yatra tu vyaṅgya-paratvenaiva vācyasya vyavasthānaṃ tatra vyaṅgya-mukhenaiva vyapadeśo yuktaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:770: prāpta-śrīr eṣa kasmāt punar api mayi taṃ mantha-khedaṃ vidadhyān
GK16andhvy_u:771: nidrām apy asya pūrvām anala-manaso naiva sambhāvayāmi /
GK16andhvy_u:772: setuṃ badhnāti bhūyaḥ kim iti ca sakala-dvīpa-nāthānuyātas
GK16andhvy_u:773: tvayy āyāte vitarkāniti dadhata ivābhāti kampaḥ payodheḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:777: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāg api tena manye
GK16andhvy_u:779: ity evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye 'nuraṇana-rūpa-rūpakāśrayeṇa kāvya-cārutva-vyavasthānād rūpaka-dhvanir iti vyapadeśo nyāyyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:781: vīrāṇaṃ rama{i} ghusiṇāruṇammi ṇa tahā piā-thaṇucchaṅge /
GK16andhvy_u:785: yathā vā mamaiva viṣama-bāṇa-līlāyām asura-parākramaṇe kāmadevasya-
GK16andhvy_u:792: sa vaktum akhilāñ śakto hayagrīvāśritān guṇān /
GK16andhvy_u:797: devāettammi phale kiṃ kīra{i} ettiaṃ puṇā bhaṇimo /
GK16andhvy_u:799: [daivāyatte phale kiṃ kriyatām etāvat punar bhaṇāmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:801: pada-prakāśaś cāyaṃ dhvanir iti vākyasyārthāntara-tātparye 'pi sati na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:804: abaraddhassa bi ṇa hu de bahu-jāṇaa rosiuṃ sakkaṃ //
GK16andhvy_u:806: aparāddhasyāpi na khalu te bahujña roṣitum śakyam //]
GK16andhvy_u:807: atra hi vācya-viśeṣeṇa sāparādhasyāpi bahujñasya kopaḥ kartum aśakya iti samarthakaṃ sāmānyam anvitam anyat tātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvy_u:811: jāejja vanuddese khujja bbia pāabo gaḍia-batto /
GK16andhvy_u:812: mā mānusammi loe tāekka-raso dariddo a //
GK16andhvy_u:814: mā mānuṣe loke tyāgaika-raso daridraś ca //]
GK16andhvy_u:815: atra hi tyāgaika-rasasya daridrasya janmānabhinandanaṃ truṭita-patra-kubja-pādapa-janmābhinandanaṃ ca sākṣāc-chabda-vācyam /
GK16andhvy_u:816: tathāvidhād api pādapāt tādṛśasya puṃsa upamānopameyatva-pratīti-pūrvakaṃ śocyatāyām ādhikyaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:820: atra hi madhau malaya-mārutasya pathika-mūrcchākāritvaṃ manmathonmātha-dāyitvenaiva /
GK16andhvy_u:821: tat tu candanāsakta-bhujaga-niḥśvāsānila-mūrcchitatvenotprekṣitam ity utprekṣā sākṣād anuktāpi vākyārtha-sāmarthyād anuraṇana-rūpā lakṣyate
GK16andhvy_u:822: na caivaṃ-vidhe viṣaye ivādi-śabda-prayogam antareṇāsaṃbaddhataiveti śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvy_u:824: īsā-kalusassa bi tuha muhassa ṇaṃ esa puṇṇimā-cando /
GK16andhvy_u:825: ajja sarisattaṇaṃ pābiūṇa aṅge bia ṇa māi //
GK16andhvy_u:826: īrṣyā-kaluṣasyāpi tava mukhasya nanv eṣa pūrṇimā-candraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:827: adya sadṛśatvaṃ prāpyāṅga eva na māti //
GK16andhvy_u:830: puṃbhir na kaiścid api dhanvibhir anvabandhi /
GK16andhvy_u:831: tasthau tathāpi na mṛgaḥ kvacid aṅga-nābhir
GK16andhvy_u:835: ramyā iti prāptavatīḥ patākāḥ rāgaṃ viviktā iti vardhayantīḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:836: yasyām asevanta namad-valīkāḥ samaṃ vadhūbhir valabhīr yuvānaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:837: atra vadhūbhiḥ saha valabhīrasevanteti vākyārtha-pratīter anantaraṃ vadhva iva valabhya iti śleṣa-pratītir aśabdāpy artha-sāmarthyān mukhyatvena vartate /
GK16andhvy_u:839: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaś ca sahakāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:840: aṅkuritaḥ pallavitaḥ korakitaḥ puṣpitaś ca hṛdi madanaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:841: atra hi yathoddeśam anūddeśe yac cārutvam anuraṇana-rūpaṃ madana-viśeṣaṇa-bhūtāṅkuritādi-śabda-gataṃ
GK16andhvy_u:843: evam anye 'py alaṅkārā yathāyogaṃ yojanīyāḥ // DhvA_2.27 //
GK16andhvy_u:844: evam alaṅkāra-dhvani-mārgaṃ vyutpādya tasya prayojanavattāṃ khyāpayitum idam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:846: te 'laṅkārāḥ parāṃ chāyāṃ yānti dhvanyaṅgatāṃ gataḥ // DhvK_2.28 //
GK16andhvy_u:847: dhvany-aṅgatā cobhābhyāṃ prakārābhyāṃ vyañjakatvena vyaṅgyatvena ca /
GK16andhvy_u:849: vyaṅgyatve 'py alaṅkārāṇāṃ prādhānya-vivakṣāyām eva satyāṃ dhvanāv antaḥ-pātaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:859: anyathā tu tad-vākya-mātram eva syāt // DhvA_2.29 //
GK16andhvy_u:865: uktaṃ hy etat-“cārutvotkarṣa-nibandhanā vācya-vyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānya-vivakṣā” iti /
GK16andhvy_u:866: vastu mātra-vyaṅgyatve cālaṅkārāṇām anantaropadarśitebhya evodāharaṇebhyo viṣaya unneyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:867: tad evam artha-mātreṇālaṅkāra-viśeṣa-rūpeṇa vārthenārthāntarasyālaṅkārasya vā prakāśane
GK16andhvy_u:870: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedān pratipādya tad-ābhāsa-vivekaṃ kartum ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:872: vācyasyāṅgatayā vāpi nāsyāsau gocaro dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.31 //
GK16andhvy_u:874: tatra ya eva sphuṭaḥ śabda-śaktyārtha-śaktyā vā prakāśate sa eva dhvaner mārgo netaraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:875: sphuṭo 'pi yo 'bhidheyasyāṅgatvena pratīyamāno 'vabhāsate so 'syānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya dhvaner agocaraḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:876: kamalāarā ṇa maliā haṃsā uḍḍābiā ṇa a piucchā /
GK16andhvy_u:877: keṇa bi gāma-taḍāe abbhaṃ uttāṇaaṃ phaliham //
GK16andhvy_u:878: [kamalākarā na malitā haṃsā uḍḍāyitā na ca pitṛ-śvasaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:880: atra hi pratīyamānasya mugdha-vadhvā jaladhara-pratibimba-darśanasya vācyāṅgatvam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:881: evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye 'nyatrāpi yatra vyaṅgyāpekṣayā vācyasya cārutvotkarṣa-pratītyā prādhānyam avasīyate,
GK16andhvy_u:882: tatra vyaṅgyasyāṅgatvena pratīter dhvaner aviṣayatvam / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:888: evaṃ-vidho hi viṣayaḥ prāyeṇa guṇībhūta-vyaṅgyasyodāharaṇatvena nirdekṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:889: yatra tu prakaraṇādi-pratipattyā nirdhārita-viśeṣo vācyo 'rthaḥ punaḥ pratīyamānāṅga-tvenaivāvabhāsate so 'syaivānuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyasya dhvaner mārgaḥ / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:890: uccinasu paḍiaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhuṇa sehāliaṃ halia-suhṇe /
GK16andhvy_u:891: aha de visama-virāvo sasureṇa suo valaa-saddo //
GK16andhvy_u:892: [uccinu patitaṃ kusumaṃ mā dhunīhi śephālikāṃ hālika-snuṣe /
GK16andhvy_u:893: eṣa te viṣama-vipākaḥ śvasureṇa śruto valaya-śabdaḥ //]
GK16andhvy_u:894: atra hy avinaya-patinā saha ramamāṇā sakhī bahiḥ-śruta-valaya-kala-kalayā sakhyā pratibodhyate /
GK16andhvy_u:896: pratipanne ca vācye 'rthe tasyāvinaya-pracchādana-tātparyeṇābhidhīyamānatvāt punar vyaṅgyāṅgatvam evety asminn anuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgya-dhvanāvantar-bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:897: evaṃ vivakṣita-vācyasya dhvanes tad-ābhāsa-viveke prastute satya-vivakṣita-vācyasyāpi taṃ kartum āha-
GK16andhvy_u:898: avyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ skhalad-gateḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:899: śabdasya sa ca na jñeyaḥ sūribhir viṣayo dhvaneḥ // DhvK_2.32 //
GK16andhvy_u:900: skhalad-gater upacaritasya śabdasyāvyutpatter aśakter vā nibandho yaḥ sa ca na dhvaner viṣayaḥ / yataḥ-
GK16andhvy_u:902: yad vyaṅgyasyāṅgi-bhūtasya tat pūrṇaṃ dhvani-lakṣaṇam // DhvK_2.33 //
GK16andhvy_u:906: evaṃ vyaṅgya-mukhenaiva dhvaneḥ pradarśite sa-prabhede svarūpe punar vyañjaka-mukhenaitat prakāśyate-
GK16andhvy_u:909: avivakṣita-vācyasyātyanta-tiraskṛta-vācye prabhede pada-prakāśatā yathā maharṣer vyāsasya-saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:910: yathā vā kālidāsasya-kaḥ sannaddhe viraha-vidhurāṃ tvayy upekṣeta jāyām /
GK16andhvy_u:911: yathā vā-kim iva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:915: tasyaivārthāntara-saṅkramita-vācye yathā-rāmeṇa priya-jīvitena tu kṛtaṃ premṇaḥ priye nocitam /
GK16andhvy_u:918: emea jaṇo tissā deu kabolopamāi sasi-bimbaṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:919: paramattha-viāre uṇa cando cando bia varāo //
GK16andhvy_u:920: [evam eva janas tasyā dadāti kapolopamāyāṃ śaśi-bimbam /
GK16andhvy_u:921: paramārtha-vicāre punaś candraś candra iva varākaḥ //]
GK16andhvy_u:924: yā niśā sarva-bhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GK16andhvy_u:925: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:926: anena hi vākyena niśārtho na ca jāgaraṇārthaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:927: kiṃ tarhi ? tattva-jñānāvahitatvam atattva-parāṅmukhatvaṃ ca muneḥ pratipādyata iti tiraskṛta-vācyasyāsya vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:929: visama{i}o ccia kāṇa bi kāṇa bi bolei amiaṇimmāo /
GK16andhvy_u:930: kāṇa bi bisāmiamao kāṇa bi abisāmao kālo //
GK16andhvy_u:931: [viṣam ayitaḥ keṣām api keṣām api prayāty amṛta-nirmāṇaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:932: keṣām api viṣāmṛta-mayaḥ keṣām apy aviṣāmṛtaḥ kālaḥ //]
GK16andhvy_u:933: atra hi vākye viṣāmṛta-śabdābhyāṃ duḥkha-sukha-rūpa-saṅkramita-vācyābhyāṃ vyavahāra ity arthāntara-saṅkramita-vācyasya vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:939: atra hi jaḍa iti padaṃ nirviṇṇena vakrātma-samānādhikaraṇatayā prayuktam anuraṇana-rūpatayā kūpa-samānādhikaraṇatāṃ sva-śaktyā pratipadyate
GK16andhvy_u:940: tasyaiva vākya-prakāśatā yathā harṣa-carite siṃha-nāda-vākyeṣu-“vṛtte 'smin mahā-pralaye dharaṇī-dhāraṇāyādhunā tvaṃ śeṣaḥ” /
GK16andhvy_u:941: etad dhi vākyam anuraṇana-rūpam arthāntaraṃ śabda-śaktyā sphuṭam eva prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:952: atra hy asamarpitam api kusuma-śareṇa madhu-māsa-lakṣmyā mukhaṃ gṛhītam ity asamarpitam apīty etad avasthābhidhāyi-padam artha-śaktyā kusumaśarasya balāt-kāraṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:953: atraiva prabhede vākya-prakāśatā yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk “sajjayati surabhimāso” ity ādi /
GK16andhvy_u:954: atra sajjayati surabhi-māso na tāvad arpayaty anaṅgāya śarān ity ayaṃ vākyārthaḥ kavi-prauḍhokti-mātra-niṣpanna-śarīro manmathonmātha-kadanāvasthāṃ vasanta-samayasya sūcayati /
GK16andhvy_u:956: vāṇiaa hatthi-dantā kutto amhāṇaṃ bāgha-kittī a /
GK16andhvy_u:960: atra lulitālaka-mukhīty etat-padaṃ vyādha-vadhvāḥ svataḥ-sambhāvita-śarīrārtha-śaktyā surata-krīḍāsaktiṃ sūcayaṃs tadīyasya bhartuḥ satata-sambhoga-kṣāmatāṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:966: anenāpi vākyena vyādha-vadhvāḥ śikhi-picchi-karṇa-pūrāyā nava-pariṇītāyāḥ kasyāścit saubhāgyātiśayaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvy_u:967: tat-sambhogaika-rato mayūra-mātra-māraṇa-samarthaḥ patir jāta ity artha-prakāśanāt tad anyāsāṃ cira-pariṇītānāṃ muktā-phala-racita-prasādhanānāṃ daurbhāgyātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
GK16andhvy_u:968: tat sa-sambhoga-kāle sa eva vyādhaḥ kari-vara-vadhavyāpāra-samartha āsīd ity artha-prakāśanāt /
GK16andhvy_u:969: nanu kāvya-viśeṣo dhvanir ity uktaṃ tat kathaṃ tasya pada-prakāśatā ?
GK16andhvy_u:973: ucyate-“syād eṣa doṣaḥ yadi vācakatvaṃ prayojakaṃ dhvani-vyavahāre syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:974: ” na tv evam ; tasya vyañjakatvena vyavasthānāt /
GK16andhvy_u:975: kiṃ ca kāvyānāṃ śarīrāṇām iva saṃsthāna-viśeṣāvacchinna-samudāya-sādhyāpi cārutva-pratītir
GK16andhvy_u:976: anvaya-vyatirekābhyāṃ bhāgeṣu kalpyata iti padānām api vyañjakatva-mukhena vyavasthito
GK16andhvy_u:981: tena dhvaneḥ prabhedeṣu sarveṣv evāsti ramyatā //
GK16andhvy_u:986: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // DhvK_3.2 //
GK16andhvy_u:987: tatra varṇānām anarthakatvād dyotakatvam asambhavīty āśaṅkyedam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:989: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.3 //
GK16andhvy_u:990: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvy_u:991: tadā taṃ dīpayanty eva te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.4 //
GK16andhvy_u:998: atra hi te ity etat padaṃ rasamayatvena sphuṭam evāvabhāsate sahṛdayānām / yathā vā-
GK16andhvy_u:1007: tiṣṭhety uktaṃ kim iva na tayā yat samutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1010: vākya-rūpaś cālakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ śuddho 'laṅkāra-saṅkīrṇaś ceti dvidhā mataḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1011: tatra śuddhasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā rāmābhyudaye-“kṛtaka-kupitaiḥ” ity ādi ślokaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1012: etad dhi vākyaṃ parasparānurāgaṃ paripoṣa-prāptaṃ pradarśayat sarvata eva paraṃ rasa-tattvaṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:1015: atra hi rūpakeṇa yathokta-vyañjaka-lakṣaṇānugatena prasādhito rasaḥ sutarām abhivyajyate // DhvA_3.3-4 //
GK16andhvy_u:1016: alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ bhāsate dhvanir ity uktaṃ tatra saṅghaṭanā-svarūpam eva tāvan nirūpyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1021: guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī mādhuryādīn vyanakti sā /
GK16andhvy_u:1023: sā saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanakti guṇānāśritya tiṣṭhantīti /
GK16andhvy_u:1024: atra ca vikalpyam guṇānāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāścaikyaṃ vyatireko vā /
GK16andhvy_u:1028: tatraikya-pakṣe saṅghaṭanāśraya-guṇa-pakṣe ca guṇānātma-bhūtānādheya-bhūtān vāśritya tiṣṭhantī saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanaktīty ayam arthaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1029: yadā tu nānātva-pakṣe guṇāśraya-saṅghaṭanā-pakṣaḥ tadā guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī guṇa-paratantra-svabhāvā na tu guṇa-rūpaivety arthaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1030: kiṃ punar evaṃ vikalpanasya prayojanam iti ?
GK16andhvy_u:1031: abhidhīyate-yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:1037: tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrgha-samāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣv asamāsā ceti /
GK16andhvy_u:1038: tatra śṛṅgāre dīrgha-samāsā yathā-“mandāra-kusuma-reṇu-piñjaritālakā” iti / yathā vā-
GK16andhvy_u:1042: vadanam idaṃ kaṃ na tāpayati //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1044: yathā-“yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti sva-bhuja-guru-madaḥ” ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1047: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayas tat kim-ālambanā ete parikalpyantām ?
GK16andhvy_u:1049: tam artham avalambante ye 'ṅginaṃ te guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1055: śabda-dharmatvaṃ caiṣām anyāśrayatve 'pi śarīrāśrayatvam iva śauryādīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:1056: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇās tat-saṅghaṭanā-rūpatvaṃ tad-āśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1057: na hy asaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā artha-viśeṣa-pratipādya-rasādy-āśritānāṃ guṇānām avācakatvād āśrayā bhavanti /
GK16andhvy_u:1060: abhyupagate vā vākya-vyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācit saṅghaṭanā teṣām āśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ity aniyata-saṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā eva guṇānāṃ vyaṅgya-viśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1061: nanu, mādhurye yadi nāmaivam ucyate tad ucyatām ;
GK16andhvy_u:1063: na hy asamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid ojasa āśrayatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1064: ucyate-yadi na prasiddhi-mātra-graha-dūṣitaṃ cetas tad atrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1066: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptir oja iti prāk pratipāditam /
GK16andhvy_u:1067: tac caujo yady asamāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāt tat ko doṣo bhavet ?
GK16andhvy_u:1069: tasmād aniyata-saṅghaṭana-śabdāśrayatve guṇānāṃ na kācit kṣatiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1070: teṣāṃ tu cakṣur-ādīnām iva yathāsvaṃ viṣaya-niyamitasya svarūpasya na kadācid vyabhicāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1071: yat tūktam-“saṅghaṭanāvad guṇānām apy aniyata-viṣayatvaṃ prāpnoti /
GK16andhvy_u:1073: tatrāpy etad ucyate-yatra lakṣye parikalpita-viṣaya-vyabhicāras tad virūpam evāstu /
GK16andhvy_u:1074: katham acārutvaṃ tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānāṃ nāvabhātīti cet ?
GK16andhvy_u:1077: tatrāvyutpatti-kṛto doṣaḥ śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt kadācin na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1078: yas tv aśakti-kṛto doṣaḥ sa jhaṭiti pratīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1081: yas tv aśakti-kṛtas tasya sa jhaṭity avabhāsate //
GK16andhvy_u:1082: tathā hi-mahā-kavīnām apy uttama-devatā-viṣaya-prasiddha-saṃbhoga-śṛṅgāra-nibandhanādy-anaucityaṃ śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt grāmyatvena na pratibhāsate
GK16andhvy_u:1084: evam ādau ca viṣaye yathaucitya-tyāgas tathā darśitam evāgre /
GK16andhvy_u:1086: yathā hi śakti-rahitena kavinā evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye śṛṅgāra upanibadhyamānaḥ sphuṭam eva doṣatvena pratibhāsate /
GK16andhvy_u:1087: nanv asmin pakṣe “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti” ity ādau kim acārutvam ?
GK16andhvy_u:1089: tasmād guṇa-vyatiriktatve guṇa-rūpatve ca saṅghaṭanāyā anyaḥ kaścin niyama-hetur vaktavya ity ucyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1094: kathā-nāyakaś ca dhīrodāttādi-bheda-bhinnaḥ pūrvas tad-anantaro veti vikalpāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1098: tatra yadā kavir apagata-rasa-bhāvo vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ kāma-cāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1099: yadāpi kavi-nibaddho vaktā rasa-bhāva-rahitas tadā sa eva;
GK16andhvy_u:1100: yadā tu kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā vaktā rasa-bhāva-samanvito rasaś ca pradhānāśritatvād dhvany-ātma-bhūtas tadā niyamenaiva tatrāsamāsā-madhya-samāse eva saṅghaṭane /
GK16andhvy_u:1102: katham iti ced ucyate-raso yadā prādhānyena pratipādyas tadā tat-pratītau vyavadhāyakā virodhinaś ca sarvātmanaiva parihāryāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1103: evaṃ ca dīrgha-samāsā saṅghaṭanā samāsānām aneka-prakāra-sambhāvanayā kadācid rasa-pratītiṃ vyavadadhātīti tasyāṃ nātyantam abhiniveśaḥ śobhate
GK16andhvy_u:1106: tayor hi sukumārataratvāt svalpāyām apy asvacchatāyāṃ śabdārthayoḥ pratītir mantharībhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:1107: rasāntare punaḥ pratipādye raudrādau madhyama-samāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācid dhīroddhata-nāyaka-sambandha-vyāpāreṇa
GK16andhvy_u:1108: dīrgha-samāsāpi vā tad-ākṣepāvinābhāvi-rasocita-vācyāpekṣayā na viguṇā bhavatīti
GK16andhvy_u:1110: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasādākhyo guṇo vyāpī /
GK16andhvy_u:1111: sa hi sarva-rasa-sādhāraṇaḥ sarva-saṅghaṭanā-sādhāraṇaś cety uktam /
GK16andhvy_u:1112: prasādātikrame hy asamāsāpi saṅghaṭanā karuṇa-vipralambha-śṛṅgārau na vyanakti /
GK16andhvy_u:1113: tad-aparityāge ca madhyama-samāsāpi na na prakāśayati /
GK16andhvy_u:1115: ata eva ca “yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti” ity ādau yady ojasaḥ sthitir neṣyate tat-prasādākhya eva guṇo na mādhuryam /
GK16andhvy_u:1118: tasmād guṇāvyatiriktatve guṇa-vyatiriktatve vā saṅghaṭanāyā yathoktād aucityād viṣaya-niyamo 'stīti tasyā api rasa-vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:1119: tasyāś ca rasābhivyakti-nimitta-bhūtāyā yo 'yam anantarokto niyama-hetuḥ sa eva guṇānāṃ niyato viṣaya iti guṇāśrayeṇa vyavasthānam apy aviruddham
GK16andhvy_u:1120: viṣayāśrayam apy anyad aucityaṃ tāṃ niyacchati /
GK16andhvy_u:1121: kāvya-prabhedāśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā // DhvK_3.7 //
GK16andhvy_u:1122: vaktṛ-vācya-gataucitye saty api viṣayāśrayam anyad aucityaṃ saṅghaṭanāṃ niyacchati /
GK16andhvy_u:1125: paryāya-bandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍa-kathā sakala-kathe sarga-bandho 'bhineyārtham ākhyāyikā-kathe ity evam ādayaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1127: tatra muktakeṣu rasa-bandhābhiniveśinaḥ kaves tad-āśrayam aucityam /
GK16andhvy_u:1130: muktakeṣu prabandheṣv iva rasa-bandhābhiniveśinaḥ kavayo dṛśyante /
GK16andhvy_u:1131: yathā hy amarukasya kaver muktakāḥ śṛṅgāra-rasa-syandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1132: sandānitakādiṣu tu vikaṭa-nibandhanaucityān madhyama-samāsā-dīrgha-samāse eva racane /
GK16andhvy_u:1135: kadācid arthaucityāśrayeṇa dīrgha-samāsāyām api saṅghaṭanāyāṃ paruṣā grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā /
GK16andhvy_u:1138: khaṇḍa-kathā-sakala-kathayos tu prākṛta-prasiddhayoḥ kulakādi-nibandhana-bhūyastvād dīrgha-samāsāyām api na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1140: sarga-bandhe tu rasa-tātparye yathā-rasam aucityam anyathā tu kāma-cāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1141: dvayor api mārgayoḥ sarga-bandha-vidhāyināṃ darśanād rasa-tātparyaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1143: ākhyāyikā-kathayos tu gadya-nibandhana-bāhulyād gadye ca chando-bandha-bhinna-prasthānatvād iha niyame hetur akṛta-pūrvo 'pi manāk kriyate //
GK16andhvy_u:1144: etad yathoktam aucityam eva tasyā niyāmakam /
GK16andhvy_u:1146: yad etad aucityaṃ vaktṛ-vācya-gataṃ saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakam uktam etad eva gadye chando-niyama-varjite 'pi viṣayāpekṣaṃ niyama-hetuḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1147: tathā hy atrāpi yadā kaviḥ kavi-nibaddho vā vaktā rasa-bhāva-rahitas tadā kāma-cāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1150: ākhyāyikāyāṃ tu bhūmnā madhyama-samāsā-dīrgha-samāse eva saṅghaṭane /
GK16andhvy_u:1153: kathāyāṃ tu vikaṭa-bandha-prācurye 'pi gadyasya rasa-bandhoktam aucityam anusartavyam // DhvA_3.8 //
GK16andhvy_u:1155: racanā viṣayāpekṣaṃ tat tu kiṃcid vibhedavat // DhvK_3.9 //
GK16andhvy_u:1156: athavā padyavad gadya-bandhe 'pi rasa-bandhoktam aucityaṃ sarvatra saṃśritā racanā bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:1157: tat tu viṣayāpekṣaṃ kiṃcid viśeṣavad bhavati,
GK16andhvy_u:1159: tathā hi gadya-bandhe 'py atidīrgha-samāsā racanā na vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-karuṇayor ākhyāyikāyām api śobhate /
GK16andhvy_u:1161: viṣayāpekṣaṃ tv aucityaṃ pramāṇato 'pakṛṣyate prakṛṣyate ca /
GK16andhvy_u:1162: tathā hy ākhyāyikāyāṃ nātyantam asamāsā sva-viṣaye 'pi nāṭakādau nātidīrgha-samāsā ceti saṅghaṭanāyā dig-anusartavyā // DhvA_3.9 //
GK16andhvy_u:1163: idānīm alakṣya-krama-vyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ prabandhātmā rāmāyaṇa-mahābhāratādau prakāśamānaḥ prasiddha eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1164: tasya tu yathā prakāśanaṃ tat pratipādyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1175: prabandho 'pi rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka ity uktaṃ tasya vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1177: yathāyathaṃ pratipipādayiṣita-rasa-bhāvādy-apekṣayā ya ucito vibhāvo bhāvo 'nubhāvaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1178: sañcārī vā tad-aucitya-cāruṇaḥ kathā-śarīrasya vidhir vyañjakatve nibandhanam ekam /
GK16andhvy_u:1181: prakṛtir hy uttama-madhyamādhama-bhāvena divya-mānuṣādi-bhāvena ca vibhedinī /
GK16andhvy_u:1182: tāṃ yathāyatham anusṛtyāsaṅkīrṇaḥ sthāyī bhāva upanibadhyamāna aucitya-bhāg bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:1183: anyathā tu kevala-mānuṣāśrayeṇa divyasya kevala-divyāśrayeṇa vā kevala-mānuṣasyotsāhādaya upanibadhyamānā anucitā bhavanti /
GK16andhvy_u:1184: tathā ca kevala-mānuṣasya rājāder varṇane saptārṇava-laṅghanādi-lakṣaṇā vyāpārā upanibadhyamānā sauṣṭhava-bhṛto 'pi nīrasā eva niyamena bhavanti,
GK16andhvy_u:1187: tad-aloka-sāmānya-prabhāvātiśaya-varṇane kim anaucityaṃ sarvorvī-bharaṇa-kṣamāṇāṃ kṣamā-bhujām iti /
GK16andhvy_u:1188: na tad asti ; na vayaṃ brūmo yat prabhāvātiśaya-varṇanam anucitaṃ rājñām,
GK16andhvy_u:1189: kiṃ tu kevala-mānuṣāśrayeṇa yotpādya-vastu-kathā kriyate tasyāṃ divyam aucityaṃ na yojanīyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1190: divya-mānuṣyāyāṃ tu kathāyām ubhayaucitya-yojanam aviruddham eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1192: sātavāhanādiṣu tu yeṣu yāvad apadānaṃ śrūyate teṣu tāvan-mātram anugamyamānam anuguṇatvena pratibhāsate /
GK16andhvy_u:1197: ata eva ca bharate prakhyāta-vastu-viṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodātta-nāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśya-kartavyatayopanyastam /
GK16andhvy_u:1198: tena hi nāyakaucityānaucitya-viṣaye kavir na vyāmuhyati /
GK16andhvy_u:1199: yas tūtpādya-vastu nāṭakādi kuryāt tasyāprasiddhānucita-nāyaka-svabhāva-varṇane mahān pramādaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1200: nanu yady utsāhādi-bhāva-varṇane kathañcid divya-mānuṣyādy-aucitya-parīkṣā kriyate tat kriyatām,
GK16andhvy_u:1202: ratir hi bhāratavarṣocitenaiva vyavahāreṇa divyānām api varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1205: tathā hy adhama-prakṛtyaucityenottama-prakṛteḥ śṛṅgāropanibandhane kā bhaven nopahāsyatā /
GK16andhvy_u:1206: trividhaṃ prakṛty-aucityaṃ bhārate varṣe 'py asti śṛṅgāra-viṣayam /
GK16andhvy_u:1207: yat tu divyam aucityaṃ tat tatrānupakārakam eveti cet-na vayaṃ divyam aucityaṃ śṛṅgāra-viṣayam anyat kiṃcid brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1208: kiṃ tarhi ? bhāratavarṣa-viṣaye yathottama-nāyakeṣu rājādiṣu śṛṅgāropanibandhas tathā divyāśrayo 'pi śobhate /
GK16andhvy_u:1209: na ca rājādiṣu prasiddha-grāmya-śṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ nāṭakādau,
GK16andhvy_u:1211: nāṭakāder abhineyārthatvād abhinayasya ca sambhoga-śṛṅgāra-viṣayasyāsabhyatvāt tatra parihāra iti cet-na;
GK16andhvy_u:1212: yady abhinayasyaivaṃ-viṣayasyāsabhyatā tat kāvyasyaivaṃ-viṣayasya sā kena nivāryate ?
GK16andhvy_u:1213: tasmād abhineyārthe 'nabhineyārthe vā kāvye yad uttama-prakṛte rājāder uttama-prakṛtibhir
GK16andhvy_u:1214: nāyikābhiḥ saha grāmya-sambhoga-varṇanaṃ tat pitroḥ sambhoga-varṇanam iva sutarām asabhyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1216: na ca sambhoga-śṛṅgārasya surata-lakṣaṇa evaikaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:1219: tasmād utsāhavad ratāv api prakṛty-aucityam anusartavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1221: yat tv evaṃ-vidhe viṣaye mahākavīnām apy asamīkṣya-kāritā lakṣye dṛśyate sa doṣa eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1222: sa tu śakti-tiraskṛtatvāt teṣāṃ na lakṣyata ity uktam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1224: iyat tūcyate-bharatādi-viracitāṃ sthitiṃ cānuvartamānena mahākavi-prabandhāṃś ca
GK16andhvy_u:1225: paryālocayatā sva-pratibhāṃ cānusaratā kavināvahita-cetasā bhūtvā vibhāvādy-aucitya-bhraṃśa-parityāge
GK16andhvy_u:1227: aucityavataḥ kathā-śarīrasya vṛttasyotprekṣitasya vā graho vyañjaka ity anenaitat
GK16andhvy_u:1228: pratipādayati-yad itihāsādiṣu kathāsu rasavatīṣu vividhāsu satīṣv api yat tatra vibhāvādy-aucityavat
GK16andhvy_u:1230: vṛttād api ca kathā-śarīrād utprekṣite viśeṣataḥ prayatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1231: tatra hy anavadhānāt skhalataḥ kaver avyutpatti-sambhāvanā mahatī bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:1234: yathā rasa-mayaṃ sarvam eva tat pratibhāsate //
GK16andhvy_u:1236: tac ca darśitam eva / kiṃ ca-
GK16andhvy_u:1238: kathāśrayā na tair yojyā svecchā rasa-virodhinī //
GK16andhvy_u:1239: teṣu hi kathāśrayeṣu tāvat svecchaiva na yojyā /
GK16andhvy_u:1241: svecchāpi yadi yojyā tad-rasa-virodhinī na yojyā /
GK16andhvy_u:1243: itivṛtta-vaśāyātāṃ kathañcid rasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ tyaktvā punar utprekṣyāpy antarābhīṣṭa-rasocita-kathonnayo vidheyaḥ yathā kālidāsa-prabandheṣu
GK16andhvy_u:1246: kavinā kāvyam upanibadhnatā sarvātmanā rasa-paratantreṇa bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1247: tatretivṛtte yadi rasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ paśyet tademāṃ bhaṅktvāpi svatantratayā rasānuguṇaṃ kathāntaram utpādayet /
GK16andhvy_u:1248: na hi kaver itivṛtta-mātra-nirvahaṇena kiṃcit prayojanam,
GK16andhvy_u:1250: rasādi-vyañjakatve prabandhasya cedam anyan mukhyaṃ nibandhanam,
GK16andhvy_u:1254: yathā veṇī-saṃhāre vilāsākhyasya pratimukha-sandhy-aṅgasya prakṛta-rasa-nibandhānanuguṇam api dvitīye 'ṅke bharata-matānusaraṇa-mātrecchayā ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1255: idaṃ cāparaṃ prabandhasya rasa-vyañjakatve nimittaṃ yad uddīpana-praśamane yathāvasaram antarā rasasya,
GK16andhvy_u:1259: prabandha-viśeṣasya nāṭakāde rasa-vyakti-nimittam idaṃ cāparam avagantavyaṃ yad alaṅkṛtīnāṃ śaktāv apy ānurūpyeṇa yojanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1260: śakto hi kaviḥ kadācid alaṅkāra-nibandhane tad ākṣiptatayaivānapekṣita-rasa-bandhaḥ prabandham ārabhate tad-upadeśārtham idam uktam /
GK16andhvy_u:1264: dhvaner asya prabandheṣu bhāsate so 'pi keṣucit // DhvK_3.15 //
GK16andhvy_u:1265: asya vivakṣitāny apara-vācyasya dhvaner anuraṇana-rūpa-vyaṅgyo 'pi yaḥ prabheda udāhṛto dviprakāraḥ so 'pi prabandheṣu keṣucid dyotate /
GK16andhvy_u:1267: yathā vā mamaiva kāmadevasya sahacara-samāgame viṣama-bāṇa-līlāyām /
GK16andhvy_u:1270: kṛt-tad dhita-samāsaiś ca dyotyo 'lakṣya-kramaḥ kvacit // DhvK_3.16 //
GK16andhvy_u:1271: alakṣya-kramo dhvaner ātmā rasādiḥ sub-viśeṣais tiṅ-viśeṣair vacana-viśeṣaiḥ sambandha-viśeṣaiḥ kāraka-śaktibhiḥ kṛd-viśeṣais tad dhita-viśeṣaiḥ samāsaiś ceti /
GK16andhvy_u:1274: nyakkāro hy ayam eva me yad arayas tatrāpy asau tāpasaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1275: so 'py atraiva nihanti rākṣasa-kulaṃ jīvaty aho rāvaṇaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1276: dhig dhik cakra-jitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā
GK16andhvy_u:1279: atra hi śloke bhūyasā sarveṣām apy eṣāṃ sphuṭam eva vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1280: tatra “me yad arayaḥ” ity anena sup-sambandha-vacanānām abhivyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:1281: “tatrāpy asau tāpasaḥ” ity atra tad dhita-nipātayoḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1282: “so 'py atraiva nihanti rākṣasa-kulaṃ jīvaty aho rāvaṇaḥ” ity atra tiṅ-kāraka-śaktīnām /
GK16andhvy_u:1283: “dhig dhik cakra-jitam” ity ādau ślokārdhe kṛt-tad dhita-samāsopasargāṇām /
GK16andhvy_u:1284: evaṃ-vidhasya vyañjaka-bhūyastve ca ghaṭamāne kāvyasya sarvātiśāyinī bandha-cchāyā samunmīlati /
GK16andhvy_u:1285: yatra hi vyaṅgyāvabhāsinaḥ padasyaikasyaiva tāvad āvirbhāvas tatrāpi kāvye kāpi bandha-cchāyā kim uta yatra teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ samavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1287: atra hi rāvaṇa ity asmin pade 'rthāntara-saṃkramita-vācyena dhvani-prabhedenālaṅkṛte 'pi punar anantaroktānāṃ vyañjaka-prakārāṇām udbhāsanam
GK16andhvy_u:1288: dṛśyante ca mahātmanāṃ pratibhā-viśeṣa-bhājāṃ bāhulyenaivaṃ-vidhā bandha-prakārāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1293: “pṛthivī gata-yauvanā” ity anena cātyanta-tiraskṛta-vācyo dhvaniḥ prakāśitaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1294: eṣāṃ ca sub-ādīnām ekaikaśaḥ samuditānāṃ ca vyañjakatvaṃ mahā-kavīnāṃ prabandheṣu prāyeṇa dṛśyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1297: yām adhyāste divasa-vigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛd vaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:1299: abasara rouṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā puṃsa me haacchīiṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:1300: daṃsaṇa-mettum bhettehiṃ jehiṃ hiaaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāaṃ //]
GK16andhvy_u:1301: [apasara roditum eva nirmite mā puṃsaya hate akṣiṇī me /
GK16andhvy_u:1302: darśana-mātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ tava hṛdayam evaṃ-rūpaṃ na jñātam //]
GK16andhvy_u:1304: mā panthaṃ rundhīo abehi bālaa ahosi ahirīo /
GK16andhvy_u:1307: [mā panthānaṃ rudhaḥ apehi bālaka aprauḍha aho asi ahrīkaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1308: vayaṃ para-tantrā yataḥ śūnya-gṛhaṃ māmakaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ vartate //]
GK16andhvy_u:1310: aṇṇatta vacca bālaa hnāantīṃ kiṃ maṃ puloesi eaṃ /
GK16andhvy_u:1311: bho jāā-bhīruāṇaṃ taḍam bia ṇa hoi //
GK16andhvy_u:1312: [anyatra vraja bālaka snāntīṃ kiṃ māṃ pralokayasy etat /
GK16andhvy_u:1313: bho jāyā-bhīrukāṇāṃ taṭam eva na bhavati //]
GK16andhvy_u:1314: kṛtaka-prayogeṣu prākṛteṣu tad dhita-viṣaye vyañjakatvam āvedyata eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1326: katham apy unnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu //
GK16andhvy_u:1328: nipātānāṃ prasiddham apīha dyotakatvaṃ rasāpekṣayoktam iti draṣṭavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1334: dvitrāṇāṃ copasargāṇām ekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ so 'pi rasa-vyakty-anuguṇatayaiva nirdoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1335: yathā-“prabhraśyaty uttarīya-tviṣi tamasi samudvīkṣya vītāvṛtīn drāg jantūn” ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1338: yathā-“aho batāsi spṛhaṇīya-vīryaḥ” ity ādau / yathā vā-
GK16andhvy_u:1339: ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca
GK16andhvy_u:1341: hā dhik kaṣṭam aho kva yāmi śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ janānāṃ kṛte
GK16andhvy_u:1342: nītānāṃ pralayaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā sādhu-dviṣaḥ puṣyatā //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1347: tat sādhavo na na vidanti vidanti kintu
GK16andhvy_u:1348: kartuṃ vṛthā-praṇayam asya na pārayanti //ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1351: acirād bhaviṣyanti panthāno manorathānām api durlaṅghyāḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:1352: atra hy acirād bhaviṣyanti panthāna ity atra bhaviṣyantīty asmin pade pratyayaḥ kāla-viśeṣābhidhāyī rasa-paripoṣa-hetuḥ prakāśate /
GK16andhvy_u:1353: ayaṃ hi gāthārthaḥ pravāsa-vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-vibhāvatayā vibhāvyamāno rasavān /
GK16andhvy_u:1354: yathātra pratyayāṃśo vyañjakas tathā kvacit prakṛty-aṃśo 'pi dṛśyate / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:1355: tad gehaṃ nata-bhitti mandiram idaṃ labdhāvagāhaṃ divaḥ
GK16andhvy_u:1356: sā dhenur jaratī caranti kariṇām etā ghanābhā ghaṭāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1357: sa kṣudro musala-dhvaniḥ kalam idaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitām
GK16andhvy_u:1358: āścaryaṃ divasair dvijo 'yam iyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //
GK16andhvy_u:1359: atra śloke divasair ity asmin pade prakṛty-aṃśo 'pi dyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1361: atra ca sarva-nāmnām eva vyañjakatvaṃ hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kvety-ādi-śabda-prayogo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1362: anayā diśā sahṛdayair anye 'pi vyañjaka-viśeṣāḥ svayam utprekṣaṇīyāḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1363: etac ca sarvaṃ pada-vākya-racanā-dyotanoktyaiva gatārtham api vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punar-uktam /
GK16andhvy_u:1365: tathā ca subādīnāṃ vyañjakatva-vaicitrya-kathanam ananvitam eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1367: kiṃ cārtha-viśeṣākṣepyatve 'pi rasādīnāṃ teṣām artha-viśeṣāṇāṃ vyañjaka-śabdāvinābhāvitvād yathā-pradarśitaṃ vyañjaka-svarūpa-parijñānaṃ vibhajyopayujyata eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1368: śabda-viśeṣāṇāṃ cānyatra ca cārutvaṃ yad vibhāgenopadarśitaṃ tad api teṣāṃ vyañjakatvenaivāvasthitam ity avagantavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1369: yatrāpi na tat sampratibhāsate tatrāpi vyañjake racanāntare yad adṛṣṭaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ teṣāṃ pravāha-patitānāṃ tad evābhyāsād apoddhṛtānām apy avabhāsata ity avasātavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1370: ko 'nyathā tulye vācakatve śabdānāṃ cārutva-viṣayo viśeṣaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:1375: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidha-sahṛdaya-vyavasthāpitānāṃ śabda-viśeṣāṇāṃ cārutva-niyamo na syāt /
GK16andhvy_u:1377: dvitīyasmiṃs tu pakṣe rasajñataiva sahṛdayatvam iti /
GK16andhvy_u:1378: tathā-vidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyo rasādi-samarpaṇa-sāmarthyam eva naisargikaṃ śabdānāṃ viśeṣa iti vyañjakatvāśrayy eva teṣāṃ mukhyaṃ cārutvam
GK16andhvy_u:1379: vācakatvāśrayāṇāṃ tu prasāda evārthāpekṣāyāṃ teṣāṃ viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1381: evaṃ rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka-svarūpam abhidhāya teṣām eva virodhi-rūpaṃ lakṣayitum idam upakramyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1382: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasādīn bandhum icchatā /
GK16andhvy_u:1383: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām // DhvK_3.17 //
GK16andhvy_u:1384: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasa-bhāva-nibandhanaṃ pratyādṛta-manāḥ kavir virodhi-parihāre paraṃ yatnam ādadhīta /
GK16andhvy_u:1385: anyathā tv asya rasa-mayaḥ śloka eko 'pi samyaṅ na sampadyate // 3.17 //
GK16andhvy_u:1386: kāni punas tāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ parihartavyāni ? ity ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1389: akāṇḍa eva vicchittir akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1391: rasasya syād virodhāya vṛtty-anaucityam eva ca // DhvK_3.19 //
GK16andhvy_u:1392: prastuta-rasāpekṣayā virodhī yo rasas tasya sambandhināṃ vibhāva-bhāvānubhāvānāṃ parigraho rasa-virodha-hetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1393: tatra virodhi-rasa-vibhāva-parigraho yathā śānta-rasa-vibhāveṣu tad-vibhāvatayaiva nirūpiteṣv anantaram eva śṛṅgārādi-vibhāva-varṇane /
GK16andhvy_u:1394: virodhi-rasa-bhāva-parigraho yathā priyaṃ prati praṇaya-kalaha-kupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgya-kathābhir anunaye /
GK16andhvy_u:1395: virodhi-rasānubhāva-parigraho yathā praṇaya-kupitāyāṃ priyāyām aprasīdantyāṃ nāyakasya kopāveśa-vivaśasya raudrānubhāva-varṇane /
GK16andhvy_u:1396: ayaṃ cānyo rasa-bhaṅga-hetur yat prastuta-rasāpekṣayā vastuno 'nyasya kathañcid anvitasyāpi vistareṇa kathanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1397: yathā vipralambha-śṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacid varṇayitum upakrānte kaver yamakādy-alaṅkāra-nibandhana-rasikatayā mahatā prabandhena parvatādi-varṇane
GK16andhvy_u:1398: ayaṃ cāparo rasa-bhaṅga-hetur avagantavyo yad akāṇḍa eva vicchittiḥ rasasyākaṇḍa eva ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1399: tatrānavasare virāmo rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacit spṛhaṇīya-samāgamayā nāyikayā
GK16andhvy_u:1400: kayācit parāṃ paripoṣa-padavīṃ prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca parasparānurāge samāgamopāya-cintocitaṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1402: anavasare ca prakāśanaṃ rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛtta-vividha-vīra-saṅkṣaye kalpa-saṅkṣaya-kalpe
GK16andhvy_u:1405: na caivaṃ-vidhe viṣaye daiva-vyāmohitatvaṃ kathā-puruṣasya parihāro yato rasa-bandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛtti-nibandhanaṃ yuktam /
GK16andhvy_u:1406: itivṛtta-varṇanaṃ tad-upāya evety uktaṃ prāk “ālokārthi yathā dīpa-śikhāyāṃ yatnavān janaḥ” ity ādinā /
GK16andhvy_u:1408: ca kavīnām evaṃ-vidhāni skhalitāni bhavantīti rasādi-rūpa-vyaṅgya-tātparyam evaiṣāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1409: yuktam iti yatno 'smābhir ārabdho na dhvani-pratipādana-mātrābhiniveśena /
GK16andhvy_u:1410: punaś cāyam anyo rasa-bhaṅga-hetur avadhāraṇīyo yat paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥpunyena dīpanam /
GK16andhvy_u:1411: upabhukto hi rasaḥ sva-sāmagrī-labdha-paripoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamānaḥ parimlāna-kusuma-kalpaḥ kalpate /
GK16andhvy_u:1412: tathā vṛtter vyavahārasya yad anaucityaṃ tad api rasa-bhaṅga-hetur eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1413: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāścid ucitāṃ bhaṅgim antareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣa-kathane /
GK16andhvy_u:1414: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharata-prasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntara-prasiddhānām upanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yad anaucityam aviṣaye nibandhanaṃ tad api rasa-bhaṅga-hetuḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1415: evam eṣāṃ rasa-virodhinām anyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayam utprekṣitānāṃ parihāre sat-kavibhir avahitair bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1419: nīrasas tu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1422: tān samāśritya na tyājyā nītir eṣā manīṣiṇā //
GK16andhvy_u:1426: bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānām uktir acchalā // DhvK_3.20 //
GK16andhvy_u:1427: sva-sāmagryā labdha-paripoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhināṃ virodhi-rasāṅgānāṃ bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānāṃ satām uktir adoṣā /
GK16andhvy_u:1428: bādhyatvaṃ hi virodhināṃ śakyābhibhavatve sati nānyathā /
GK16andhvy_u:1429: tathā ca teṣām uktiḥ prastuta-rasa-paripoṣāyaiva sampadyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1430: aṅga-bhāvaṃ prāptānāṃ ca teṣāṃ virodhitvam eva nivartate /
GK16andhvy_u:1431: aṅga-bhāva-prāptir hi teṣāṃ svābhāvikī samāropa-kṛtā vā /
GK16andhvy_u:1432: tatra yeṣāṃ naisargikī teṣāṃ tāvad uktāv avirodha eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1433: yathā vipralambha-śṛṅgāre tad-aṅgānāṃ vyādhy-ādīnāṃ teṣāṃ ca tad-aṅgānām evādoṣo nātad-aṅgānām /
GK16andhvy_u:1434: tad-aṅgatve ca sambhavaty api maraṇasyopanyāso na jyāyān /
GK16andhvy_u:1436: karuṇasya tu tathā-vidhe viṣaye paripoṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet na ;
GK16andhvy_u:1439: śṛṅgāre vā maraṇasyādīrgha-kāla-pratyāpatti-sambhave kadācid upanibandho nātyanta-virodhī /
GK16andhvy_u:1440: dīrgha-kāla-pratyāpattau tu tasyāntarā pravāha-viccheda evety evaṃ-vidhetivṛttopanibandhanaṃ rasa-bandha-pradhānena kavinā parihartavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1441: tatra labdha-pratiṣṭhe tu vivakṣite rase virodhi-rasāṅgānāṃ bādhyatvenoktāv adoṣo yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:1442: kvākaryaṃ śaśa-lakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā
GK16andhvy_u:1443: doṣāṇāṃ praśamāya me śrutam aho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvy_u:1444: kiṃ vakṣyanty apakalmaṣāḥ kṛta-dhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā
GK16andhvy_u:1445: cetaḥ svāsthyam upaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati //
GK16andhvy_u:1446: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāṃ prati pravṛtta-nirbharānurāgasya dvitīya-muni-kumāropadeśa-varṇane /
GK16andhvy_u:1452: samāropitāyām apy avirodho yathā-“pāṇḍu-kṣāmam” ity ādau /
GK16andhvy_u:1453: iyaṃ cāṅga-bhāva-prāptir anyā yadādhikārikatvāt pradhāna ekasmin vākyārthe rasayor bhāvayor vā paraspara-virodhinor dvayor aṅga-bhāva-gamanaṃ tasyām api na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1457: anya-paratve 'pi virodhinoḥ kathaṃ virodha-nivṛttir iti cet,
GK16andhvy_u:1459: ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
GK16andhvy_u:1461: atra hi vidhi-pratiṣedhayor anūdyamānatvena samāveśe na virodhas tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvy_u:1462: śloke hy asminn īrṣyā-vipralambha-śṛṅgāra-karuṇa-vastunor na vidhīyamānatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:1463: tripura-ripu-prabhāvātiśayasya vākyārthatvāt tad-aṅgatvena ca tayor vyavasthānāt /
GK16andhvy_u:1464: na ca raseṣu vidhy-anuvāda-vyavahāro nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum,
GK16andhvy_u:1466: vākyārthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhy-anuvādau tau tad-ākṣiptānāṃ rasānāṃ kena vāryate /
GK16andhvy_u:1468: tais teṣāṃ tan-nimittatā tāvad avaśyam abhyupagantavyā /
GK16andhvy_u:1470: yasmād anūdyamānāṅga-nimittobhaya-rasa-vastu-sahakāriṇo vidhīyamānāṃśād bhāva-viśeṣa-pratītir utpadyate tataś ca na kaścid virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1472: viruddha-phalotpādana-hetutvaṃ hi yugapad ekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhaya-sahakāritvam /
GK16andhvy_u:1473: evaṃ-vidha-viruddha-padārtha-viṣayaḥ katham abhinayaḥ prayoktavya iti cet,
GK16andhvy_u:1476: kiṃ ca nāyakasyābhinandanīyodayasya kasyacit prabhāvātiśaya-varṇane tat-pratipakṣāṇāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1477: yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyam ādadhāti pratyuta prīty-atiśaya-nimittatāṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1478: pratipadyata ity atas tasya kuṇṭha-śaktikatvāt tad-virodha-vidhāyino na kaścid doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1479: tasmād vākyārthī-bhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasa-virodhīti vaktuṃ nyāyyaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:1481: athavā vākyārthī-bhūtasyāpi kasyacit karuṇa-rasa-viṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāra-vastunā bhaṅgi-viśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasa-paripoṣāyaiva jāyate
GK16andhvy_u:1482: yataḥ prakṛti-madhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocanīyatāṃ prāptāḥ prāg-avasthā-bhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇair vilāsair adhikataraṃ śokāveśam upajanayanti / yathā-
GK16andhvy_u:1485: tad atra tripura-yuvatīnāṃ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnir ārdrāparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sma /
GK16andhvy_u:1486: tathā vyavahṛtavān ity anenāpi prakāreṇāsty eva nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvy_u:1487: tasmād yathā yathā nirūpyate tathā tathātra doṣābhāvaḥ / itthaṃ ca-
GK16andhvy_u:1491: dāvāgniṃ parito bhramanti punar apy udyad-vivāhā iva //
GK16andhvy_u:1492: ity evam ādīnāṃ sarveṣām eva nirvirodhatvam avagantavyam /
GK16andhvy_u:1493: evaṃ tāvad rasādīnāṃ virodhi-rasādibhiḥ samāveśāsamāveśayor viṣaya-vibhāgo darśitaḥ // DhvA_3.20 //
GK16andhvy_u:1494: idānīṃ teṣām eka-prabandha-viniveśane nyāyyo yaḥ kramas taṃ pratipādayitum ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1496: eko raso 'ṅgīkartavyas teṣām utkarṣam icchatā // DhvK_3.21 //
GK16andhvy_u:1497: prabandheṣu mahākāvyādiṣu nāṭakādiṣu vā viprakīrṇatayāṅgāṅgi-bhāvena bahavo rasā
GK16andhvy_u:1498: upanibadhyanta ity atra prasiddhau satyām api yaḥ prabandhānāṃ chāyātiśaya-yogam
GK16andhvy_u:1499: icchati tena teṣāṃ rasānām anyatamaḥ kaścid vivakṣito raso 'ṅgitvena viniveśayitavya
GK16andhvy_u:1501: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāpta-paripoṣeṣu satsu katham ekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ity āśaṅkyedam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1504: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punar anusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo
GK16andhvy_u:1505: rasas tasya sakala-bandha-vyāpino rasāntarair antarāla-vartibhiḥ samāveśo yaḥ sa
GK16andhvy_u:1508: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1509: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
GK16andhvy_u:1510: sandhyādi-mayasya prabandha-śarīrasya yathā kāryam ekam anuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tat-kāryāntarair na saṅkīryate,
GK16andhvy_u:1511: na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyam apacīyate,
GK16andhvy_u:1512: tathaiva rasasyāpy ekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodho na kaścit /
GK16andhvy_u:1513: pratyuta pratyudita-vivekānām anusandhānavatāṃ sa-cetasāṃ tathā-vidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate // DhvA_3.23 //
GK16andhvy_u:1514: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā-vīra-śṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgāra-hāsyayo raudra-śṛṅgārayor
GK16andhvy_u:1515: vīrādbhutayor vīra-raudrayo raudra-karuṇayoḥ śṛṅgārādbhutayor vā tatra bhavatv aṅgāṅgi-bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1516: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhaved yeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhya-bādhaka-bhāvaḥ ?
GK16andhvy_u:1517: yathā-śṛṅgāra-bībhatsayor vīra-bhayānakayoḥ śānta-raudrayoḥ śanta-śṛṅgārayor vā ity āśaṅkyedam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1519: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
GK16andhvy_u:1520: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandha-vyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃ na netavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1521: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgi-rasāpekṣayāty antam ādhikyaṃ na kartavyam ity ayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣa-parihāraḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1524: snehena raṇa-rasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam /
GK16andhvy_u:1526: kaṇṭhāc chitvākṣamālāvalayam iva kare hāram āvartayantī
GK16andhvy_u:1529: devī sandhyābhyasūyā hasita-paśupatis tatra dṛṣṭā tu vo 'vyāt //ity atra /
GK16andhvy_u:1531: niveśane vā kṣipram evāṅgirasa-vyabhicāry-anuvṛttir iti dvitīyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1532: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpy aṅga-bhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1534: virodhinas tu rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā kasyacin nyūnatā sampādanīyā /
GK16andhvy_u:1535: yathā śānte 'ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya /
GK16andhvy_u:1536: paripoṣa-rahitasya rasasya kathaṃ rasatvam iti cet-uktam atrāṅgirasāpekṣayeti /
GK16andhvy_u:1537: aṅgino hi rasasya yāvān paripoṣas tāvāṃs tasya na kartavyaḥ,
GK16andhvy_u:1538: svatas tu sambhavī paripoṣaḥ kena vāryate /
GK16andhvy_u:1539: etac cāpekṣikaṃ prakarṣa-yogitvam ekasya rasasya bahu-raseṣu prabandheṣu rasānām
GK16andhvy_u:1540: aṅgāṅgi-bhāvam anabhyupagacchatāpy aśakya-pratikṣepam ity anena prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ
GK16andhvy_u:1541: virodhināṃ ca rasānām aṅgāṅgi-bhāvena samāveśe prabandheṣu syād avirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1542: etac ca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasya vyabhicārī bhavati iti darśanaṃ tan-matenocyate /
GK16andhvy_u:1543: matāntare 'pi rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārād rasa-śabdenoktās teṣām aṅgatvaṃ nirvirodham eva // DhvA_3.24 //
GK16andhvy_u:1544: evam avirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandha-sthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇam avirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhi-viṣayam eva taṃ pratipādayitum idam ucyate-
GK16andhvy_u:1545: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
GK16andhvy_u:1546: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
GK16andhvy_u:1547: ekādhikaraṇy avirodhī nairantarya-virodhī ceti dvividho virodhī /
GK16andhvy_u:1548: tatra prabandha-sthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1549: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakas tad-vipakṣa-viṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1550: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1551: vipakṣa-viṣaye hi bhayātiśaya-varṇane nāyakasya naya-parākramādi-sampat sutarām uddyotitā bhavati /
GK16andhvy_u:1552: etac ca madīye 'rjuna-carite 'rjunasya pātālāvataraṇa-prasaṅge vaiśadyena pradarśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:1553: evam aikādhikaraṇya-virodhinaḥ prabandha-sthena sthāyinā rasenāṅga-bhāva-gamane nirvirodhatvaṃ yathā tathā tad darśitam /
GK16andhvy_u:1557: yaḥ punar ekādhikaraṇatve nirvirodho nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasāntara-vyavadhānena prabandhe niveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvy_u:1559: śāntaś ca tṛṣṇā-kṣaya-sukhasya yaḥ paripoṣas tal-lakṣaṇo rasaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16andhvy_u:1561: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham /
GK16andhvy_u:1563: yadi nāma sarva-janānubhava-gocaratā tasya nāsti naitāvatāsāv aloka-sāmānya-mahānubhāva-citta-vṛtti-viśeṣaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ śakyaḥ /
